feed.title: JClic activities
feed.subtitle: Library of open educational activities created with JClic

author.name: Clic Project - Catalan Educational Telematic Network (XTEC)

entry.title: Art al circ
entry.summary: "Art al circ" (Art in the circus) is a project designed to make a short walk through various artworks inspired by the circus world. The project is organized in three levels: Level 1: Pre-school and first cycle of primary school It's suitable for children who are learning to read. It offers a vision of the language of the circus. It contains phrases, riddles, and activities consiting of disguising the characters with circus costumes, putting noses on the clowns, listening to the sounds of the circus and singing songs with the spanish group "los payasos de la tele" Level 2: First and middle cycles of primary school It offers us the possibility of discovering artworks relating them to their authors, as well as to techniques, materials and pictorial currents. Level 3: Middle and upper cycles of primary school It will help us to understand the history and philosophy of the circus. It will also allow us to know some schools, NGOs and Catalan circus companies. All levels can be played with accompaniment. We …

author.name: Imma Palahí, Enric J. López (Veu), Aram López (Col·laboració), Nil López (Col·laboració), Jan Llorens (Veu), Mar Horta (Veu), Marta Torvisco (veu)

entry.title: El clic de les hores amb la Joana Nadal
entry.summary: Juana Nadal guides us through a journey through time and hours. You can start this project from five different topics: 1. "Problems" 2. "Old watches" 3. "Curiosities" 4. "The time in the world" 5. "Additions and substractions" We recommend not doing all the activities at once and choosing the most appropriate ones. This JClic project is the third part of "Click on time" series, formed by: "Click on time with Pau Bosch" (part one) and "Click on time with Mar Horta" (part two)

author.name: Imma Palahí (Idea, dibuixos i creació), Enric López (Assessorament i veu), Aram López (Música i vídeos (Sumes, restes i sistema sexagesimal), Adriana Beltrán del Río (Correcció), Joana Nadal (Veu)

entry.title: El clic de les hores amb la Mar Horta
entry.summary: Mar Horta leads shows us how a watch work. You can choose two options: "small jobs" and "games". In "small jobs" you will find two sections: "know" and "recognize". "Know" contains 12 packages of activities. "Recognize" contains 9 packages of activities. "Games" contains 9 more activity packages Recommended for computer and tablet.

author.name: Imma Palahí (Idea, dibuixos i creació), Enric López (Assessorament i veu), Aram López (Veu), Adriana Beltrán del Río (Correcció), Mar Horta (Veu)

entry.title: El clic de les hores amb en Pau Bosch
entry.summary: Pau Bosch leads us by clicking showing us his schedule and some basic notions of the clock and the hours. Recomended for computer and tablet.

author.name: Imma Palahí (idea, dibuixos i creació), Pau Bosch (veu), Enric López (creació), Aram López (música), Adriana Beltrán del Rio (correcció)

entry.title: La Closa del Ter Vell
entry.summary: With this project we pretend that the studets know, easily and funny way, this habitat so close and at the same time so unknown.

entry.summary: Set of activities about the origin, properties, types, conformation and recycling of plastic materials.

entry.title: Fonema /B/
entry.summary: In this project different activities are carried out to strengthen the articulation of the /b/ phoneme in Catalan.

entry.summary: This project wants to consolidate the following concepts in the area of Technology: structures, efforts and properties of the materials.

entry.summary: Pack of activities to work structures and the different efforts that they sustain. We will fins activities such as puzzles, simple association, complex association, memory and identification of information.

entry.title: Biodiversitat
entry.summary: Package of complementary activities to the CEEDCV resources, where the basic concepts of classification and nomenclature of living beings are discussed. Directed to the basic training of adults.

entry.title: Biodiversidad
entry.summary: Package of complementary activities to the CEEDCV resources, where the basic concepts of classification and nomenclature of living beings are discussed. Directed to the basic training of adults.

entry.title: Els éssers vius
entry.summary: Project aimed at the formation of adults in the high school graduate. Contains exercises on living beings and cellular structure.

entry.summary: Games to know the Cristhmas vocabulary in Catalan Signs Language (LSC)

entry.title: IMPLICA'T + amb la PAU
entry.summary: This project develops Principle 4 of the Earth Charter: DEMOCRACY, NON-VIOLENCE and PEACE. With this project we want to promote the knowledge of these concepts through encouraging and functional activities.

author.name: Noemí Munné Reig (autora), Montserrat Pons Balcells (autora)

entry.title: Zenbakizko proportzionaltasuna eta ehunekoak
entry.summary: In this project you will find the following contents: 1.- Numerical proportionality 2.- Directly proportional magnitudes (ratio, proportion, magnitudes, directly proportional magnitudes) 3.- Inverse proportional magnitudes 4.- Percentages

author.name: Enrique González Campo (egilea/autor), Karmele Olano Goti (euskara-aholkularia/correctora de euskera)

entry.title: Pitagorasen Teorema
entry.summary: In this project you will find the following contents: 1.- Introduction to the square root 2.- The square root 3.- Introduction to the Pythagorean theorem. 4.- Pythagorean Theorem 5.- Problems

author.name: Enrique González Campo (egilea/autor), Karmele Olano Goti (euskara-aholkularia/correctora de euskera)

entry.title: Sinfones y sílabas mixtas
entry.summary: In this project we will work exhaustively on the discrimination of mixed syllables orally and in writing. Among the activities included, stand out: - Exercises to classify between / l / i / r /, between mixed syllables. - Puzzles that contain images with mixed syllables. - Memory games. - Identification of mixed syllables. - Crosswords with definitions and images to guess the word. - Localization of words written incorrectly in texts and subsequent correction. - Complete sentences with the most appropriate words. - Writing words from images.

entry.title: Los seres vivos
entry.summary: Project aimed at the formation of adults in the high school graduate. The concept of living being and cellular structure is worked on.

entry.title: Busca la paraula 2
entry.summary: This pack of activities is the new version of "Busca la paraula". From an image filled with words of different colors, fonts and orientation, the student has to find a specific word. There are 189 words sequenced in groups of 10, to facilitate access. Except the last activity that is a puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

entry.title: La otra división
entry.summary: Update of the group of activities "Divisiones". This update contains activities for the exercise or elementary training of the division algorithm and also some problems have been added. The level of difficulty is graduated in parts: with subtraction, without subtraction, by one digit, by two digits ... The problems have been obtained from the "Nivelación Restitutiva de Matemáticas" program, promoted by the Ministry of Education of Chile.

entry.title: Multiplica multiplicando
entry.summary: Pack of activities aimed to develop abilities of mathematical thinking skills. Some activities propose to resolve problems of everyday situations so that students could see maths as a necessary tool in life. Also you will find many operations to resolve. These problems were extracted from "Programa Liceo Para Todos" of Ministry of Education of Chile. Based on "Nivelación restitutiva matemática" year 2003.

entry.title: Les emocions i el control emocional
entry.summary: This pack of activities is aimed at emotional education. We will work the basic or primary emotions (fear, sadness, anger and joy) and the secondary emotions. Through hypothetical situations, we will identify what emotion we would feel, thus working on empathy. We will also find activities on self-control to regulate emotions. Finally, we will discover a set of videos to relax and meditate, to help calm down and make better decisions.

entry.title: Sant Jaume dels Domenys
entry.summary: With this JClic middle and upper middle school children will learn about the town of Sant Jaume dels Domenys by working on reading comprehension, mathematics, spatio-temporal orientation, etc. Educational objectives: - To know the location of the municipality in the Baix Penedès region - To know the most significant entities and associations of the people for the children - To know the nuclei and urbanizations that make up the town of Sant Jaume dels Domenys - Get to know the services offered by the people - To know the flag and the shield - To know the historical buildings and the tourist attractions of the population

entry.title: Personagens do folclore Brasileiro
entry.summary: Reading and writing activities on themes and characters of Brazilian folklore.

entry.title: Aljebra
entry.summary: In this project you will find activities with the following content: - Introduction to Algebra - Algebraic expressions (numerical value of an algebraic expression, algebraic language) - Monomials (definition, elements, similar and opposite monomials, operations)

author.name: Enrique González Campo (egilea/autor), Karmele Olano Goti (euskara-aholkularia/correctora de euskera)

entry.title: El Seguici festiu de Reus
entry.summary: Pack of activities to work in primary education, where children can know and identify the elements and music of main characters of festivities of Reus. In a globalizing way we work on aspects of literacy, mathematics, music, and discovery of the social and cultural environment of our city.

author.name: Glòria Vidal (autora), Andrés Faro Lalanne (il·lustrador), Martí Nolla Vidal (àudios)

entry.title: Las "Nuevas Poblaciones de Andalucía y Sierra Morena"
entry.summary: Pack of activities to commemorate the 250th Anniversary of the "Nuevas Poblaciones de Andalucía y Sierra Morena", an intendacy established by King Carlos III of Spain in 1767. You will find ordering, association and completion activities, and listen to the hymn of "Nuevas Poblaciones".

entry.title: Aprenent a aprendre Càlcul Mental
entry.summary: Curricular enrichment educational software, dedicated to reinforce the strategies and knowledge that students possess for the mental calculation. It is divided into three levels ranging from the most basic to the most advanced.

entry.title: Tangram infantil 1
entry.summary: Tangram activities for working on spatial orientation.

entry.title: Mots encreuats
entry.summary: A set of crosswords to work on vocabulary and the introduction to writing.

entry.title: Calcula quin número falta
entry.summary: Activity to work the reverse operation on additions. The activities propose exercises of mental calculation and reasoning.

entry.title: Fonema /R/
entry.summary: With this project we intend to strengthen the articulation of the /r/ phoneme in all its variants.

author.name: Xavier Pujades Pi (Logopeda), Sergio Palao - ARASAAC (dibuixos), Virginia Aragón Jiménez

entry.title: Fonema /K/
entry.summary: With this project we intend to consolidate the correct articulation of the phoneme / k / differentiating it from other similar sounds phonologically.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez (Creació), Sergio Palao - ARASAAC (Dibuixos), Anna Fontelles Terrés (Adaptació al català)

entry.title: Esports LSC
entry.summary: Thematic dictionary of sports signs.

entry.title: Benvinguts a la Terra
entry.summary: Project to start developing the critical spirit of solidarity, values, respect and care with children in Primary cicle. Activities included in the Implica't+ project with Earth Charter (UNESCO)

author.name: Noemí Munné Reig, Montserrat Pons Balcells

entry.title: Describing people and animals
entry.summary: This package of activities will allow the student to describe in English, both physically and in character, people and animals. Also offer examples of different grammatical constructions, such as pronouns "he, "she", it" and the verb "to have got" in third person. Works natural content at the same time it is introduced a lot of vocabulary visually. The student will learn to classify animals betwen: - mammals - reptiles - birds - fish - amphibians - insects

entry.title: Programa de habilitación auditiva "PHAIC"
entry.summary: This auditory habilitation program pretends to stimulate the hearing of the child at the beginning of care after the placement of the cochlear implant and / or hearing aids, or to rehabilitate the hearing of students with phonological problems, for the recognition of the different environmental sounds, as a first step to the discrimination of speech sounds or to work on general auditory discrimination. The stimulation phases that are followed: detection, discrimination, identification, recognition and understanding. The categories that are included in the project are: animals, street, house, body, instruments and nature. We will also find an explanation of the project to understand the operation of some activities.

entry.title: Nascuts a Reus
entry.summary: This package of activities wants to familiarize children with professions and places that remember and honor illustrious citizens of Reus.

author.name: Francisca Doncel, Margarida Paredes, Anna Parés

entry.title: AlfaLibras
entry.summary: Alfalibras was created in order to offer to begginners of Libras (Brazilian Sign Language) a way to learn and train their knowledge about the manual alphabet, very useful on day-to-day basis. Alfalibras has funny activities to train your learing!

entry.title: Mujer y ciencia
entry.summary: Project about twelve scientists women through the history, branch of science where they stand out, teir main contribution to science, birthplaces ans recognition received.

entry.title: Introducción a la robótica
entry.summary: Through the following activities it is intended that students learn the basics of robotics and then practice what they have learned.

entry.title: 3 altures sonores
entry.summary: Project to develop listening and recognition of melodic sequences with three tones (major arpeggio)

entry.title: Fruites i verdures
entry.summary: In this project we can find activities to work on the recognition of fruits and vegetables, through visual memory and auditory association.

entry.title: Amb els 5 sentits
entry.summary: Package of activities to know and work the 5 senses: sight, hearing, smell, taste and touch. Includes: information, exploration, association and memory activities, word searches and puzzles. They are dynamic and fun activities.

entry.title: ¡Agua va!
entry.summary: The objective of this activity is to think on the utilities of water and become aware of the need to use water responsibly.

entry.title: L'hivern
entry.summary: With this project you will work vocabulary about winter. You will find many activities with which you will learn to conjugate verbs related to winter, to categorize names and verbs, to order sequences and to work on the concept of space, among others.

author.name: Marta Martínez, Isabel Abián, Montse Codina, Laura Colacios, Maria Loza, Ruby Toro, Maria Josep Filgueiras (il·lustracions), Carla Grau (il·lustracions)

entry.title: Palabras con figuras
entry.summary: Package of activities of reading-writting to improve attention, where we will find words formed with firt letter of each figure.

entry.title: EmocionaTEA
entry.summary: Package of activities to work four basic emotions with children with Autism spectrum disorder. You will find activities like puzzles, associations and memory, to work these emotions: - Joy - Sadness - Anger - Fear

entry.title: El mosquit tigre
entry.summary: Activities to bring the problem of the Asian tiger mosquito to schools and help in the prevention and control of the species.

entry.title: La volta al món en 80 dies
entry.summary: This project aims to review some countries for which Willy Fog spent in his "Around the World in Eighty days" (animated adaptation of the novel by Jules Verne), starting from London. And at the same time, know some places and people from these places.

entry.title: Sílabas trabadas
entry.summary: Pack of activities to work phonetics and spelling of words containing the following goup of syllables: BRA, FRA, GRA, PRA and TRA.

entry.title: Higiene postural
entry.summary: This project aims to raise awareness about the importance of adopting correct postures, through content related to postural hygiene.

entry.title: La prehistoria
entry.summary: These activities are about prehistory, cave painting, where prehistoric men lived, how they hounted the mammoth and other animals with which they lived.

entry.title: El ordenador y sus componentes
entry.summary: Pack of activities about computer and its components. The concept of computing, operating system, hardware and software is worked on. It consists of activities to relate, identify and order.

author.name: Mónica Albiñana Cid, Enrique Boix López, Roberto Herrero Ramos

entry.title: Las herramientas en el taller
entry.summary: Pack of activities to know the main tools to work in wooden, electricity, mechanics, metal and technical drawing workshop. You will find enjoyable activities like puzzles, alphabet soups or simple associations.

entry.title: JP-ABC Juego Interactivo
entry.summary: Simple and charming play games that wants to familiarize children with animals, letters, numbers, objects and more. With sounds and its relation with letters and drawings it wants to stimulate the early learning of children.

entry.title: Els oficis
entry.summary: In this project you will find activities aimed at working the trades and learning related vocabulary. You can also work sequencing and numbering.

entry.title: Barcino
entry.summary: This project is about the roman Barcelona. Consists of memorizing and relation activities with images of monuments of Barcino.

entry.title: Gorputza
entry.summary: Pack of activities in Basque language where we can learn basic vocabulary about calculus, anatomy, averyday life and tales. We will fins activities to relate, memorize and calculate while learning the language.

entry.title: Bullying
entry.summary: The main goal of next activities is to fight bullying between teenagers. Through activities of association, puzzles and memory we pretend raise awareness of young people to eradicate bullying in their locatity.

author.name: Yessica Leal Bonilla, Leslie Nathaly Báez Hernández, Julissa Inés del Ángel Hervert, Nayla Elizabeth López Arteaga, Nathali Montserrat Parker Monsibais, Azalia Alejandra Zaleta Guzmán

entry.title: La vaca
entry.summary: This project shows the main features of cows: parts of the cow, family of the cow, places where they live, their sound and the products that they gives to us.

entry.title: Verbes essentiels
entry.summary: Package of activities to review essential verbs in French, their conjugations and verbal times. In traduction activities you have audios to exercise hearing.

entry.title: Canvi d'unitats
entry.summary: Package of activities to work unit changes and movement problems. These activities are proposed for secondary level.

entry.title: Parts of the plant
entry.summary: These activity works English vocabulary about the parts of the plant. You will find activities to connect, to arrange and audios to practise hearing.

entry.title: Comandante Hussi
entry.summary: The purpose of these package of activities is literary literacy of 9th grade of primary school (Brazil), from the work Comandante Hussi, Jorge Araújo. There is organized from the methodology for literary reading proposed by Rildo Cosson (2014), entitled "Sequência didática expandida".

entry.title: Paisaje y relieve
entry.summary: With these package of activities the students will be able to make a review of landscape theme. These activity works separately landscape kinds and relief kinds. These package contains activities to review, to identify and to enjoy.

entry.title: Comarca de Ordes
entry.summary: Package of activities about Ordes region, province of La Corunna. We will find activities about relief, hydrography, weather, towns and population. There are also activities about Ordes town, where is CEIP Mesón do Vento is located.

entry.title: Materials
entry.summary: Package of activities to work contents about materials: kinds, origin, properties, waste generated and recycling.

entry.title: Juguemos con las letras
entry.summary: Package of activities to practice reading of words and sentences composed by the five vowels and these consonants: d, j, l, m, n, ñ, p, s and t. The package is divided into four blocks with very varied activities for children of 5, 6 and 7 years.

entry.title: Ler é divertido
entry.summary: Activities to motivate reading based on tales "A que sabe a lúa", "Os oficios de Xan", "A cabana na árbore" and "Otto é un rinoceronte". They work characters and stories according to tale chapters. We can find activities of all kind, from puzzles, associations, letter soups, to text activities.

entry.title: La geografia del món
entry.summary: Pack of 8 activities to practice and learn aspects about geography of the world, with units of knowledge about reliefs, geographic accidents, rivers and streams, countries and their capitals and flags, natural monuments, landscapes, constructions...

entry.title: Animals everywhere
entry.summary: Pack of activities that pretends: Identify different animals and body parts of these animals. Describe the appearance of animals. Identify the sound emitted of each animal. Use the verb "to have".

entry.title: Joan Miró - Colors i formes
entry.summary: Activities about colours and shapes that dominate the most symbolic works of the artist, that we can find at Joan Miró museum in Barcelona. It also includes an emotional education activity .

entry.title: España física
entry.summary: Activities about the relief, climate and rivers of Spain, based on the text "Environmental Awareness" - World Water Project. Editorial Alhucemas-Edelvives 6th Primary level.

entry.title: Animals i animalets
entry.summary: Package of activities to learn vocabulary and concepts about animal world. Activities are divided in three blocks, one for each Kindergarten level. Each block is adapted to the contents worked at each level, as well as the difficulty. You will find all kind of activities, from puzzles to text activities.

entry.title: Els éssers vius
entry.summary: Pack of activities to work living beings classifications and main characteristics; from the first cell to the present.

entry.title: L'època medieval
entry.summary: Interdisciplinary project about Middle ages. Activities works different issues like feudal society, constructions or the most common animals. Is addressed to primary education.

entry.title: Poema "El cargol"
entry.summary: Activities of reading and writing to work the poem "El cargol" of Josep Carner.

author.name: Anna Parés Martínez, Eva Sáez i Paula Cardiel

entry.title: Proves de càlcul mental
entry.summary: Is a pack of activities that pretends to work speed in mental calculation of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division algorithms. Each activity has 60 operations and a maximum time to complete of 2 and a half minutes. These operations have been extracted and digitalized from "El Quinzet".

entry.title: A biblioteca
entry.summary: Pack of activities to understand books organization in a library using UDC (Universal Decimal Classification).

entry.title: La prehistòria al Moianès
entry.summary: This package contains three blocks of activities about prehistory, with special attention to the records found around Moianès county, in Catalonia: - History and sources of information - Prehistoric fauna in Moianès - Food in prehistory

author.name: Grup de treball 'La prehistòria al Moianès' i Isabel Marcos Hidalgo

entry.title: Temps atmosfèric i clima de Catalunya
entry.summary: Activities about weather, climate in Catalonia and climate change. These activities are divided on these areas: Experimental sciences: main atmospheric phenomena (temperature, wind and rainfall), the weather in Catalonia, climate change and greenhouse effect, water cycle, weather forecast, etc. Catalan language: sayings and proverbs about weather. English: basic vocabulary about weather and climate.

entry.title: Tectònica de plaques. Els marges.
entry.summary: Activities that review what happens between the edges of plate tectonics.

entry.title: Phonics
entry.summary: Pack of activities in English to review vocabulary and sounds of some words.

entry.title: Los números naturales
entry.summary: Pack of activities with different exercises and problems about natural numbers. Identification of natural numbers Properties Common factor Division Square root Power Multiplication Problems resolution

entry.title: μανιτάρια
entry.summary: Activities in Greek about mushrooms, for mushroom hunters.

entry.title: Electrical appliances
entry.summary: Activities to expand vocabulary in English about some electrical appliances. Instructions are in Spanish.

entry.title: δέλτα-βήτα
entry.summary: Reading activities for children with pronunciation problems in Greek phonemes. This activity is completely done with Greek alphabet.

entry.title: English for beginners
entry.summary: There are small activities for children who are learning to speak English. Contains relation word-image and sentence order activities.

entry.title: Los verbos
entry.summary: Set of activities to work the verb, attending the person, number, time and modus.

entry.title: Les tortugues
entry.summary: Pack of activities about turtles for Kindergarten. Activities are classified in three blocks: we learn with turtles (mathematical concepts), how are turtles? and what do turtles eat?

author.name: MªÁngeles Sanz Monroig i Míriam Parés

entry.title: La dinàmica interna de la Terra
entry.summary: Activity useful to review the structure and internal dynamics of Earth. There are activities that work: the structure, the origin of the internal energy of the earth, the lithosphere plate, seismicity, vulcan science, folds and faults, rock formation.

entry.title: Patrones y sucesiones
entry.summary: Constructions of integer numbers sequences from the algebraic rules that define them. And get the general rule (in algebraic language) of an arithmetic progression of integer numbers sequence.

entry.title: España política
entry.summary: Activities about population, production sectors and political organization of Spain, based on the text "Environment knowledge" - project Mundo Agua (Water World). Alhucemas editorial - Edelvives 6th levels of Primary education.

entry.title: English vocabulary
entry.summary: It's an English activity pack of basic vocabulary of those topics: numbers, toys, family, colours, food, animals, clothes, body and Christmas

entry.title: La prehistòria i el Pla de Petracos
entry.summary: This project contains a set of activities related to Prehistoric and Pla de Petracos. Is an ancient Moresque village, that belongs to the municipality of Castell de Castells. This spot is in Pop valley, in Marina Alta (Alacant)

entry.title: Antecessores e sucessores
entry.summary: Activities for primary school about antecessor and successor numbers, in Brazilian Portuguese.

author.name: Fabiana Zimmermann i Márcia Silva Madeira

entry.title: Matemáticas en la Alhambra
entry.summary: The Alhambra and its decoration of geometric mosaics is the transversal axis of this didactic unit that pretends to mix mathematics content, with other historic and artistic contents, and make our students improve their predisposition of mathematics and increase their knowledge and appreciation for the andalusi legacy, so present in our environment.

entry.title: Seres Vivos
entry.summary: Set of varied and attractive activities that deal with four aspects: Inert matter and living beings Vital function of living beings Cell unit life Classification of living beings

entry.title: Producció d'energia
entry.summary: Review of energy-producing plants and their principal parts. Exploration of energy concept. Corresponds to a didactic unit of high school and secondary school level of education.

entry.title: Ecosistemes marins
entry.summary: This project contains activities about characteristics of marine animals and plants. Is designed for the level of Basic education of adults.

entry.title: El paisaje
entry.summary: These activities gives an overview about the types of landscapes, both natural and humanized the suffering these changes and their most important features.

entry.title: Els animals de la Vall de Núria
entry.summary: Jclic Núria Valley, consists of three activity packs one for each level of Primary Education, raised in an increasing degree of difficulty. the activities are based on the study of four animals most significant Vall de Nuria: chamois, marmots, red frog and ptarmigan.

entry.title: Friendship (Sing "You've a got a friend" by James Taylor)
entry.summary: JClic activities to learn English: Textual genres: music, biography and quotation Listening activities Grammar points: suffixes Vocabulary Text comprehension Opposites: nouns and adjectives Order of the words

entry.title: Prepositions of place
entry.summary: Project for learning and strengthening of the most basic place prepositions in English.

entry.title: تعلم الحروف العربية (Learn Arabic letters)
entry.summary: Project of 10 activity packs addressed to kindergarten to learn Arabic letters.

author.name: Fatima Atya, Hedi Magroun i MounaTouati

entry.title: El ruc
entry.summary: Set of activities about the donkey: How is it? What eats? Descriptions Games

entry.title: Frutas
entry.summary: Activities of reading and word formation through mobile letters and syllables, in Spanish. Aimed at pre-school.

author.name: Ana Claudia Mansueto - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Piratas
entry.summary: This project contains activities related to the vocabulary of the world of pirates, in Spanish. Recommended for pre-school, special education and first cycle of primary education. Listen, read, write and learn the vocabulary of pirates.

author.name: Ana Claudia Mansueto - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Fonema /K/
entry.summary: In this project we are going to strengthen the correct articulation of the phoneme k them from other similar sounds phonologically.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Profesiones
entry.summary: In this project we intend to strengthen the knowledge of the most frequent jobs, with special emphasis on oral language and logical reasoning.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Las estaciones y las prendas de vestir
entry.summary: In this project we are going to know the athmospheric phenomena of each season, as well as the clothes more frequently used according to weather.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Los medios de comunicación
entry.summary: The objective of this project is to know the most usual media and the human senses used with each, emphasizing on oral language and logic reasoning.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Mi localidad
entry.summary: In this project we are going to see mainly the businesses appear in our locality, what we buy and who sells us, as well as other services that offers us the place where we live. We must also be careful and respect the traffic signs that we find in the street.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Fonema /R/
entry.summary: This project intends to strengthen the articulation of the /r/ phoneme in all its variants.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Fonemas Palatales
entry.summary: In this project we will work the phonemes and graphemes CH-LL / Y-Ñ, so that the students learn to discriminate and differentiate it with respect to articulation, reading and writing.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Fonema /B/
entry.summary: In this project different activities are carried out to strengthen the articulation of the /b/ phoneme

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: La casa
entry.summary: In this project we are going to work the utensils that the professionals use to build a house, as well as the parts of the house and the elements and actions that are carried out in them.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Los alimentos
entry.summary: In this project we will know many types of food that we usually take in our diet, vegetable and animal, classifying them in various ways, with special emphasis on oral language and logical reasoning.

author.name: Virginia Aragón Jiménez - Dibuixos: Sergio Palao (ARASAAC.org)

entry.title: Los tiempos verbales
entry.summary: Activities related to Spanish tenses: Simple and compound Pasts, present and future Perfect and imperfect Forms of tenses

entry.title: El agua
entry.summary: Activities related to water: water states, state changes, the water in nature, the water cycle.

author.name: José Félix de la Torre Peláez,

entry.title: El otoño y la vendimia
entry.summary: Different activities for children at kindergarden to work on the activities of autumn: the process of wine, characteristics and fruits of autumn.

entry.title: Time english for you
entry.summary: English project to learn basic adjectives and their opposites, recommended for last courses of primary education.

entry.title: La verema
entry.summary: This package provides help on learning the different parts of the grape, vine and wine production as well.

entry.title: Les vocals
entry.summary: Package of activities to help students identify vowels. Part of one syllable words that relate to the image, the sound... Finally, ask students to write vowels corresponding to each sound.

entry.title: Los verbos en inglés
entry.summary: Project related to the use and application of basic, regular and irregular verbs in English An additional evaluation test is available to check the level of students.

author.name: Cesar Giovanni Meléndez Morales i Sharon Lorena Garzon Madero

entry.title: Energies renovables
entry.summary: This JClic know what are the most important renewable energy sources, its uses and its advantages and disadvantages.

entry.title: Educación Sexual Integral (ESI)
entry.summary: Play with the contents of comprehensive sex education. It includes the rights of children and adolescents.

entry.title: Busca la paraula
entry.summary: From an image full of words written in different colors, with horizontal orientation, vertical or inclined and with different types of sources, each activity is asked to click on a word and look it. This package is designed for students who are at an initial level of reading and reading practice in a playful way, as they take it as a game. For students who have a particular difficulty to improve reading or are stagnant, highly motivating activities such as reading a practical purpose. Tip: Sometimes you get discouraged if you are looking for a long time and do not find the word. It helps motivate them to continue working to give students a clue such as: is on the left or right or top or bottom of the screen, the floor is sloping or vertical or horizontal, and the word is written in red or blue ...

entry.title: Edward Jenner
entry.summary: The activity project is divided into four parts: life, work camps , discovery and play. In the first section examines the biography , the second block is working the various fields of work for which moved this historical figure, the third section focuses on the discovery and the last block is a set of activities where there crosswords, reading, solving mathematical problems or job specific vocabulary among others.

entry.title: Animaliak
entry.summary: Animaliak is a project of animals. It works different features, concepts, sizes and vocal.

entry.title: Les llegendes d'Avinyonet del Penedés
entry.summary: Project activities related with the Avinyonet del Penedès legends aimed at primary school students who want to know the works of the oral tradition of the Alt Penedès. The activities are structured from the four legends: the Palmisser, the bell of Santa Magdalena, the dance quarry, the Queen of Cantallops.

author.name: David Paredes Calabuig i Eduard Solé

entry.title: Molins, ponts, rentadors i fonts de Balenyà Molins
entry.summary: All activities where you work how important water mill for flour, for washing, the bottom and out of our bridges.

entry.summary: Project of activities about the neighborhood. It is divided into three distinct units: shops the facilities and services the elements of the street (street furniture, parts of the road...)

entry.title: La cigonya
entry.summary: The stork is a project aimed at children nursery and initial cycle for gaining a migratory bird: Stork, deeply rooted in the Aiguamolls. Work different aspects characteristic of this bird: their parts, where they live, what to eat, measure, weight, how they communicate...

entry.title: L'aventura del reciclatge
entry.summary: This project is conducted in English and Catalan is based on the 3 "R": reduce, recycle and reuse.

entry.summary: This activity pack evaluate the minimum content of Mathematics at P5: the numbering concept, mass production, order, sizes, shapes, addition, subtraction...

entry.summary: Discover the old airfields used in the Spanish civil war in Balenyà and Tona.

entry.summary: Project of activities about the basic values through song and story. It also has activities about peculiarities of animals and products we can provide.It contains four sections: Story Animal Song Activities Puzzles

entry.title: Llegim (Nivell 2)
entry.summary: Project of activities to work phonological awareness in the beginnings of learning to read and write by reading images and association and autodictats. It consists of two levels: the first level contains words with phonetic content easier and level contains two words with phonetic content harder.

entry.summary: Project of activities to work phonological awareness in the beginnings of learning to read and write by reading images and association and autodictats. It consists of two levels: the first level contains words with phonetic content easier and level contains two words with phonetic content harder.

entry.summary: Small project aimed at children from kindergarden. Activities related to the sea. Turtles, dolphins and octopuses.

entry.title: The history of space exploration
entry.summary: It varied activities (complete text, associations, information screens...) which reviews the history of space exploration, making a tour of the ships that have gone into space and places you have conquered. The activities are done in English because it is primarily designed for this course, although it could be used in Environment.

entry.title: Corfbol / Korfbal
entry.summary: The project is a tool to support the work of the unit Korfball, within the area of physical education. It is a reinforcement of sports-related content from the aspect of technology for learning and communication. The JClic activities consists of three parts: history, definition and regulation. Each part contains korfball related activities, puzzles, word searches, activities fill spaces...

entry.title: El treball de la frase
entry.summary: Pack activities about making richer and deeper in an interactive and entertaining work of the sentence. The pack has activities rhymes, counting syllables, word order, sentence related images, create sentences ...

entry.summary: Collect various activities working vocabulary and basics of the profession and its astronauts to space travel. Astronauts Equipment Constellations and stars

entry.title: Els arbres fruiters
entry.summary: It is a project for literacy work cycle starting from the fruit trees we have in the garden of the initial cycle of the school Pinetons The Garriga (Barcelona). It also will help us better understand and fruit trees that give fruits. At the time, try different times of the year and the fruits can be found each time.

entry.title: Educación Física
entry.summary: interactive learning activities to support the contents of the area of physical education developed in four sections: anatomy hygiene sports values

entry.title: Els escacs a l'escola
entry.summary: In our school long time ago committed to the introduction of chess as an educational tool and as a tool to develop skills through play. We are convinced that chess has many advantages intellectual and that is why each year we increase activities related to chess. This constant improvement JClic this arises, which is dedicated to collecting the rules and basic skills that any child needs to start in the world of chess.

entry.title: Multiplicar
entry.summary: Learning and Assessment multiplication tables to start progressively students in memorizing the tables. Recommended for primary school.

entry.summary: Activities for the recognition of inorganic chemical functions.

entry.summary: JClic activities about Venezuela, their states and capitals.

entry.summary: JClic activities addressed to students of infantile education about the first dinosaurs that existed on the Earth through identification activities, puzzles, memory and exploratory activities.

entry.summary: JClic activities addressed to primary education about Zamora, Edo. Aragua, Venezuela, location, parishes that comprise, historic and tourist sites, economic and religious through partnership activities, puzzles, word searches and identification activities.

entry.summary: JClic activities addressed to primary education about the Chikungunya virus, symptoms, prevention and treatment to fight it.

entry.summary: JClic activities addressed to infantile education about the food pyramid and its parts through memory activities, identification activities and puzzles.

entry.summary: JClic activities addressed to students of preschool education that aims to commemorate the Day of Indigenous Resistance, through memory activities, puzzles and identification exercises.

entry.title: Solucionamos conflictos
entry.summary: Activities directed to the second cycle of infantile education about the resolution of conflicts in the classroom. Five conflicts that may arise between students and for each five types of activities are presented are presented: the conflict associated with the right solution, order the sequence to resolve the conflict, the conflict associated with its proper cause, associate each solution with its consequences and identify what we can do in a conflict.

entry.summary: This project reinforces the definitions of the different types of triangles: Elements of a triangle Classification of triangles Theorem sum of interior angles

entry.summary: Language activities for students of the first cycle of primary education work the closed syllables, both in pronunciation and writing. It is also suitable for students with special educational needs.

entry.summary: Series of 15 exercises about tens and hundreds addressed to primary education.

entry.summary: JClic activities about Sports at primary education: AIMS: Know and learn Sports. Improve healthy habits that offers sports. Acquire and implement the Physical Education Values and life daily. Use of New Technologies on the acquisition of the content presented.

entry.summary: JClic project activities about the fall: puzzles, associations, memory games, games... addressed to infantile education.

entry.summary: This project contains the most important elements of the relief of the Community of Madrid (mountains, rivers...), towns and most important areas and natural landscapes.

entry.summary: JClic activities Course Office. We emphasize programs like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access.

entry.summary: Activities related to the tale Jungle Book; identification activities, exploration of relationship, attention and a short narrative story with visual support pictograms.

entry.title: Las Ecorregiones Naturales del Perú
entry.summary: JClic activities designed to publicize the eleven Ecoregions of Peru and some definitions.

entry.title: English animals
entry.summary: "The English animal" is a JClic project about world of animals angles. It is a series of activities addressed to students of primary education about the animals, their habitats, their classifications, vocabulary and basic grammar in English. Through these activities, we also work listening, reading and writing.

entry.title: El dia de la paz
entry.summary: Activities relating to the day of peace at school. Small tribute to Mahatma Ghandi.

entry.title: La paz
entry.summary: Interactive activities about the peace to celebrate on the 30th of January.

entry.title: Time for lunch
entry.summary: Vocabulary about food for lunch.

entry.title: Emocions
entry.summary: JClic project activities work the knowledge of simple and complex emotions.

entry.title: El peix Irisat, de Marcus Pfister
entry.summary: Project for kinder garden's school packages of activities related to the story "The Rainbow Fish" by Marcus Pfister. This JClic includes a methodology based on the stories and staged a visual support, so the fact that motivates them to listen and speak and finally be able reproduce the stories. The project has two parts. In the first sequence there is a story to watch and listen. In the second proposed activities: puzzles, associations, memory games... All activities are media because at this stage has yet to acquire the reading process and therefore need the support of sound and audio to perform activities.

author.name: Anna Rodríguez Melero Anna Rodríguez Melero

entry.title: El folclor lanero
entry.summary: This project contains activities based on reading the book "La Canoa wonderful" Silvia Aponte, writer wool and the second with a series of wool folklore related activities and tourism in Villavicencio, Meta, Colombia.

entry.title: Menjar bé!
entry.summary: JClic activities to help to improve nutrition throw some fun activities.

author.name: Comissió de medi ambientb del Sagrat Cor

entry.title: Les hores en punt
entry.summary: This JClic addressed the first cycle of primary education about hours and clocks.

entry.title: El cuerpo. "Proyecto AUDIVIR"
entry.summary: In this project we try to educate the child's hearing in the early rehabilitation after placement of the cochlear implant. It is also used for students with different levels of hearing loss or any kind of student / work required to the various ambient sounds. We follow the different phases: detection, discrimination, identification, recognition and understanding. Here we focus on the body.

entry.title: Los siete hábitos de las personas felices
entry.summary: Based on the statements of Stephen Covey, it is aimed at elementary school students and is part of a project called "a leader in me" being developed about three years ago in several cities of the country (Colombia), in short this JClic contains theoretical basis of the project but understandable language for children and aims to shape attitudes of leadership.

entry.title: El Solsonès
entry.summary: Activity about the Solsonés (Catalonia). The content has been structured into five sections: Regional information, towns, natural environment, social environment and artistic heritage and culture. From the menu screen you can access each section.

entry.title: Salvem la terra
entry.summary: This falls within JClic Project + Get involved with the Earth Charter, and is aimed at secondary school students. With it we want to know the importance of our planet and the need and obligation to take care in order to preserve it. We want men and women to reflect and realize that protecting the Earth with its diversity and beauty is a duty we can not ignore.

entry.title: Els vikings
entry.summary: Package of activities related to the Vikings: puzzles, memory, sorting letters to build words, scrambled letters...

entry.summary: JClic activities with exercices about Kantian ethics.

entry.summary: Project of activities JClic about Greek philosophy, specifically, Plato and The Myth of the cave.

entry.summary: JClic activities about Descartes and his philosophy.

entry.title: Rimas
entry.summary: JClic project activities in the Portuguese language addressed to primary education about the rhymes .

entry.summary: This project includes several activities related with common words proposed in the work Ortografia sense esforç (Spelling effortlessly) by Daniel Gabarró. The first block is a sample of activities with simple words. The second block according to the difficulty of words is a little higher. In the third block there activities of these words (and other).

entry.title: Els gegants de Terrassa
entry.summary: Project of activities about the Geganters de Terrassa (Giants of Terrassa): giants bigheaded giants team the construction of a giant Terrassa, city of giants 2015

entry.title: Weather and calendar
entry.summary: Project of activities in English about: weather seasons months week days

entry.title: El transport en la indústria química
entry.summary: Project addressed to students of CFGM de Planta química associated with transport of materials in chemical plant. It serves as a review after each unit of matter or complete. Do not want to be exhaustive, but give the student a idea if understood their training.

entry.title: The hydrosphere
entry.summary: Theses JClic activities belong to the unit of "The hydrosphere" which students are taught using English as a communication tool. The activities are aimed at the student to learn the vocabulary of the unit and some simple processes.

entry.title: Tablas de multiplicar
entry.summary: Project of JClic activities to practice multiplication tables 2 to 9.

entry.title: Els ocells de Catalunya
entry.summary: This project includes different activities with different modalities in order to publicize different birds from Catalonia.

author.name: Joaquima Paretas Ros JOAQUIMA PARETAS ROS

entry.title: El museu de la meva escola
entry.summary: Children in second grade primary school in Santa Susanna have created some pictures and have drawn them in Paint. In addition, they have invented a name for their works. This JClic contains activities where they have to relate the paintings with the corresponding names, puzzles or memory activities.

entry.title: ¡Nos vamos a la ópera!
entry.summary: This project will help us enter the world of opera conducting a series of activities that in a fun and easy going to have a rough idea of this wonderful world.

entry.title: España. Las comunidades Autónomas en lenguaje de signos
entry.summary: JClic activity addressed to deaf children users of Spanish language signs. It consists of name identification activities of the autonomous region, on a map of Spain, photographs images associated with that community and the sign that represents and association activities between them. It also has puzzles in which the letters of the name of the community are ordered with the allusive image that appears behind.

entry.title: Las figura geométricas planas
entry.summary: This project is a set of activities with information and exercises in which students can learn easily plane figures. Includes defining polygon, parts, calculating the perimeter, sorting of polygons according to their sides, triangles classification (by its sides and angles) and finally classifying quadrilaterals (parallelograms not parallelograms), all this with their respective information and activities. They have tried to use objects in the environment, so that students learn to associate objects with different plane figures and thus leave aside the static geometry has always been taught in the area of mathematics.

entry.title: Les aus rapinyaires
entry.summary: This JClic about raptors is a project of twenty activities focused in the characteristics that distinguish birds from raptors. Different groups of raptors and its main characteristics are also presented.

entry.title: El modelatge del relleu. Agents i processos geològics externs
entry.summary: JClic project about external geomorphology and the changes in the modelling of the relief caused by the hydrosphere, atmosphere and biosphere. About the influence of external geological agents and the description of the different geological processes involved. The influence of lithology is also described in the evolution of a relief. External geological agents associated with the hydrosphere, atmosphere and biosphere. External geological processes associated with each of the agents: weathering, erosion, transport and deposition. Modelled relief: fluvial, glacial, coastal and wind. Weathering: mechanical, chemical and biological.

entry.title: La càmera digital
entry.summary: JClic activity about the parts of a digital camera and the different photographic plans and photography.

entry.title: Las aves que nos rodean
entry.summary: Activity to spread awareness of the main birds that we can find living among our houses.

entry.title: Els aliments
entry.summary: Activity designed to work different food groups and their properties and nutrients. The definitions are written in Catalan and food names in French and Portuguese. It is therefore a multilingual activity. The activity is addressed to third cycle of primary education and first cycle of secondary education.

entry.title: Fem paraules
entry.summary: Set of phonological awareness activities to work and order of letters in a word. The package of activities is divided into four packages of activities: words of one, two, three and four syllables.

entry.summary: Project of activities about four different cultures of the world: Catalan culture Chinese culture American culture Moroccan culture

entry.title: Cangur 2013 (Nivell 4 - 2n de batxilerat)
entry.summary: These projects allows you to do the Cangur Test Cangur interactively. It's self-correcting. It also provides the solutions of each of the 30 tests. It also shows a final report of activities with the total number of right answers and the time spent. The statements have been prepared by the Cangur Commission Catalan Society of Mathematics - Le Kangourou sans frontières.

entry.title: El Plafó de la Xocolatada
entry.summary: This project of activities is a tribute to "the chocolate panel", made 300 years ago to decorate the gardens of the palace of the Marquis of Alella (near Barcelona). This ceramic panel, very well preserved, tells us about customs and daily life in the eighteenth century. The project is organized in two main blocks: The look About the panel Characters The place Actions Personal items Puzzles Beyond the look The passage of time Customs Society Chocolate From cocoa to chocolate Chocolate in the world Ancestors To learn more...

entry.title: El pi pinyer
entry.summary: This JClic is focused on the discovery of pinion pine. So all planned activities revolve around this tree by providing various information on it. The activities are aimed at students in Kindergarten and we can find three levels of difficulty (P3, P4, P5). They are usually very playful activities (puzzles, matching games, memory, etc.) and others more focused on literacy (identifying words ...).

entry.title: Els ratolins
entry.summary: JClic activities aimed at children in infantile education. It starts with a oriental traditional tale that introduces values and encourages students to reflect. It does so through a very simple and repetitive very appropriate for their age. The activity is accompanied by voice, so that students can access independently. It contains a series of activities that reinforce and extend learning to other areas and content (math, language, environment ...).

entry.title: Cantar, tocar, escoltar
entry.summary: JClic Project to work on the music classroom. This project consists of 14 activities classified into three diferent sections: SingThis section contains activities related to traditional songs for children. PlayThis section has activities related to the presentation and recognition (timbre and visual) of small percussion instruments. ListenThis section presents activities related to the hearing of an excerpt from the musical "The carnival of the animals": listening a fragment of it and explaining some features of the composer's biography and work.

entry.title: It's carnival!
entry.summary: This project aims at working on the topic of Carnival from a multicultural point of view. It deals with the four main skills that children in Primary Education must develop in order to achieve a good competence in the use of English. Besides, the topic is worked from three different views as it deals with the celebration of this popular festivity in three very different countries: Spain, Italy and Brazil.

entry.title: Enséñame a hablar

The project has nine blocks of activities linked together, so that this project should be treated as a whole.

entry.title: Cangur 2010 (Nivell 4 - 2n de Batxillerat - País Valencià)
entry.summary: These projects allows you to do the Cangur Test Cangur interactively. It's self-correcting. It also provides the solutions of each of the 30 tests. It also shows a final report of activities with the total number of right answers and the time spent. The statements have been prepared by the Cangur Commission Catalan Society of Mathematics - Le Kangourou sans frontières.

entry.title: El joc de les matemàtiques
entry.summary: Set of more than 300 activities for the area of mathematics at kindergarten created by Imma Palahí. The activities are also available on the web www.immapalahi.cat . Logic Level 1 : Wrong object: an object in the picture should not be there. Basics concepts: colours, shapes and volume. To where: there is a different figure. Roads: you have to do a path to find an object. Series: You have to continue it Level 2: Sort: tidy up the room picking up objects. Opposites: paint different concepts. Part of all: look for the missing portion of the picture . Mazes: follow the maze to find the object you want. Necklaces: just complete the necklaces. SPACE AND TIME Level 1 : Temporary stories: sort the pictures according to the sequences. Hidden picture: click on the blackboard and get a picture. Colours: order as the original boxes. Cross-tabulation: relate the shape and colour in her house. Mirror: looking body parts. Exercise of laterality. What we do: what we do at school and at home? Level 2: …

author.name: Imma Palahí Col·laboració: Aram López, Eugènia Palahí, Nil López i Pau, Jan Guillem, Ma Jesús i Maria Veu: Enric J. López, Jan Llorens, Mar Horta i Marta Torvisco

entry.title: Cangur 2009 (03 - Nivell 4 - 2n de Batxillerat)
entry.summary: These projects allows you to do the Cangur Test Cangur interactively. It's self-correcting. It also provides tips and the solutions of each of the 30 tests. It also shows a final report of activities with the total number of right answers and the time spent. The statements have been prepared by the Cangur Commission Catalan Society of Mathematics - Le Kangourou sans frontières.

entry.summary: Project activities about different angles concepts classified by: amplitude (acute, straight, flat, dull and full) position (complementary, additional, consecutive and opposite the apex)

entry.title: Koloreekin jolasten
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarden about four colours (blue, yellow, red and green).

entry.title: Juguem amb els colors a P3
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarden about four colours (blue, yellow, red and green).

entry.title: Sudokus
entry.summary: Logic and reasoning activities following the rules of the game Sudoku. There are two types of images and activities with each other with numbers up to 4. The project targets children of 5 to 7 years old and the activities are organized in two levels of difficulty.

entry.title: Galí: Català de l'Alguer - Qui só? Com só? (iniciació)
entry.summary: The package of activities Galí has more than 1.500 exercises arranged into 56 working sessions, which are divided into six main areas: How does it write? How do I pronounce it? Who am I? How am I? What time is it? What day are we? What do I like? What do I eat? Where do I live? What do I do? What do I buy? Where am I going? Morpho-syntax In each section there are sessions corresponding to two levels of difficulty levels: Introduction Advanced These activities are part of the online application Gali. This project is the development of CD-ROM "Gali" which was produced in 2000 as part of an European project jointly performed by the Education Department of the Generalitat de Catalunya, the Centre Départemental de Documentation Pédagogique des Pyrénées -Orientales and the Center for Educational Resources, "Maria Montessori" of Alghero. Other Gali versions: Galí: Català central Galí: Català nord-occidental

Who am I? How am I? What time is it? What day are we? What do I like? What do I eat? Where do I live? What do I do? What do I buy? Where am I going? Morpho-syntax In each section there are sessions corresponding to two levels of difficulty levels: Introduction Advanced These activities are part of the online application Gali. This project is the development of CD-ROM "Gali" which was produced in 2000 as part of an European project jointly performed by the Education Department of the Generalitat de Catalunya, the Centre Départemental de Documentation Pédagogique des Pyrénées -Orientales and the Center for Educational Resources, "Maria Montessori" of Alghero. Other Gali versions: Galí: Català nord-occidental Galí: Català de l'Alguer

author.name: Josep Pi, Lluïsa Bruch, Maria Areny i Montserrat Torra Dibuixos: GANG, estudi multidisciplinari Programació: Francesc Busquets Veu: Carles Martínez, Enregistraments sonors del curs audiovisual Digui Digui i Neus Sendra

entry.title: Las cuatro operaciones con fracciones
entry.summary: Project of activities about operations with fractions. The activities are classified into 20 different topics and consist of solving problems.

entry.title: Les lletres vocals
entry.summary: JClic activities about vowels. The project has five parts one of them for each vowel.

entry.title: El tiempo
entry.summary: Set of activities about the about the measurement of the time: the hours the week days the moths the clocks

entry.title: El sistema solar 2
entry.summary: Activities addressed to primary education about the names and the characteristics of the eight planets of the solar system and other elements of the space: astronaut, comet, moon, universe, galaxy ...

entry.title: Sant Antoni de Portmany
entry.summary: Project of activities about Sant Antoni (Balearic Islands). The project has two parts: infantile education primary education

entry.title: Sant Vicenç de Castellet
entry.summary: JClic activities about Sant Vicenç de Castellet a town in Catalonia: characteristics situation and relief hydrograph vegetation population ...

author.name: Joan Picas i Casanovas Fotografies: Teresa Dols i Blanch

entry.title: Les joies de la trigonometria
entry.summary: Project activities created as a research work about trigonometry on 2nd Batxillerat: Trigonometric reasons Resolution of rectangle triangles Formulas Resolution of non-rectangle triangles. The Aureus number This package of activities has been awarded with the CIRIT Awards 2008 and Cornellà City Awards 2008

entry.title: Sumes i restes
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to firs cycle of primary education: Numeration unit one hundred Sums Rests

author.name: Antonio Díez Roma i Joan Carles Fiol Colomar

entry.title: El Romànic
entry.summary: Project activities on Romanesque art for infantile education (P4-P5). These activities serve to strengthen and complement the work done in the classroom. It deals with mathematical language (sets, puzzles, associations, relations ...) and verbal and written language (sort letters, write names, words and sounds related ...).

entry.title: Orienta't
entry.summary: Project of activities about academic guidance, the project has three parts: You Your options Job search strategies

entry.title: Matemática na Educação Infantil
entry.summary: Project activities to develop the concept of numerical sequence, relating mathematics as a spatial dimension of intelligence and develop skills for resolving problems.

entry.title: Treballem la igualtat de gènere a l'ambit laboral
entry.summary: Awareness about equal opportunities in the workplace, facilitating reflection on the need to banish certain beliefs that prevent all enjoy the same opportunities.

entry.title: Pictogrames de perillositat
entry.summary: JClic project about warning pictograms of chemical substances. It contains identification activities of chemical substances found in the lab and at home.

entry.title: Aparells de mesura
entry.summary: balance test-tube burette pipette thermometer ...

entry.title: Utillatge químic
entry.summary: JClic project about 36 materials that are used in the laboratory. metal glass porcelain ...

entry.title: Análisis sintáctico
entry.summary: Project of activities related to the syntactic analysis of sentences: The subject The predicate ...

entry.title: Ortografía literal
entry.summary: Project of activities about orthography in Spanish: C G R

entry.title: Clases de adjetivos
entry.summary: Project of JClic activities about adjectives in Spanish: qualifying adjectives demonstrative adjectives possessive adjectives numeral adjectives indefinite adjectives

entry.title: Los verbos
entry.summary: Project of activities about verbs in Spanish. The project has four parts: Regular verbs Compound verbs Comprehension Irregular verbs

entry.title: À table
entry.summary: JClic activities about food in French: Vocabulary of food Using partitive Using descriptive adjectives

entry.title: Josep Guinovart
entry.summary: Project of activities about Josep Guinovart addressed to infantile education and his works. The project has 34 activities: the author puzzles associations The reproduction of the illustrations in this activity use the right to quote with educational purposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Department of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

author.name: Maria Torres Español Veu: Àngels Llurda

entry.title: Els felins
entry.summary: Project of activities to learn the vocabulary and some characteristics of felines (cat, lynx, tiger, puma ...). The activities are separated into two blocks.

entry.title: La fruiteria
entry.summary: Project of activities for the youngest pupils about fruits. It contains activities to learn the name of each fruit, how to write their name, scrambled letters, puzzles, which bear fruit stones and which not and which have the thin or thick skin.

entry.title: L'aventura pirata
entry.summary: Set of activities for infantile education about pirates: The history of the Pirates Pirates' names Puzzles Typical pirate elements The pirate's song

entry.title: Eating Out
entry.summary: Project of activities in English addressed to frits course of secondary education. The project has four different parts: Learning about food Set the table The men Learning to cook

entry.title: Termes, aqüeducte, aigua, romans, Tàrraco
entry.summary: August and Julia from the Roman age take us to the past. We were taught what the Roman baths and aqueducts were, and why were used. They also explain some things that the Romans taught us, and we still do use. JClic full of knowledge. First, the other activities must be done before doing feinetes.

author.name: Enric J. López i Imma Palahí Col·laboració: Aram López Veu: Nil López

entry.title: Potències
entry.summary: JClic activities about powers: Powers of natural base and exponents Powers of integer base and natural exponents Properties of powers Powers of integer base and exponents Powers of integer base and fractional exponents Exercises of powers and their properties

entry.title: Islas Canarias
entry.summary: Clic activities about the Canary Islands, which are them, which are they symbols, etc.

entry.title: Sons oberts i tancats
entry.summary: JClic activities about sounds in Catalan language. The project has two different parts: Treballem els sons de la /e/ Treballem els sons de la /o/

entry.title: Balenes
entry.summary: Project of activities about whales: Parts of a whale Types of whales What do whales eat? Puzzles Reading and writing activities

author.name: Josep Casals López, Lidia Pardo Pastor i Manel Martín Folch

entry.title: La tabla periódica
entry.summary: Project of activities on the periodic table: Identification of the elements. Management of the table. Blocks of the table. Definition of periodic properties (ionic radius, ionization energy, electronic affinity and electro negativity). Electronic configurations of the representative elements, transition metals and transition internally. Theoretical questions about the periodic system.

entry.title: Els tigres
entry.summary: Project activities addressed to kindergarten students about the tigers. These activities are designed to do after work in the classroom on these mammals.

entry.title: Cangur 2008
entry.summary: This project allows you to do the Cangur Test Cangur interactively. It's self-correcting. It also provides tips and the solutions of each of the 30 tests. It also shows a final report of activities with the total number of right answers and the time spent. The project has been jointly developed by the fruitfully teacher-student binomial. The statements have been prepared by the Cangur Commission Catalan Society of Mathematics.

author.name: Juan Vicente Folch i Santi Lapenya

entry.title: Sumas llevando
entry.summary: Project of activities to practice the sum in first cycle of primary education. There are also problems to solve.

entry.title: To be
entry.summary: Set of activities to learn and revise the verb "To be" in the present tense.

entry.title: Antiga Roma
entry.summary: Set activities about the ancient history of Rome, easy resolution to work with students of secondary education. There are activities to review the basic content of the item.

entry.title: Duc, el poltre de Sebes
entry.summary: Set of activities about horses with puzzles, numbers, reading and writing, etc. The activities are addressed to kindergarten.

entry.title: Fem la mona!
entry.summary: Project of 22 activities about "La mona" typical Easter pie in Spain. The project has two parts: ingredients language games

entry.title: Consciència fonològica
entry.summary: Set of activities to learn to read with three levels of difficulty: Level 1: one word and two pictures Level 2: two words and two pictures Level 3: three words and three pictures

entry.title: Primeres lectures (1a part)
entry.summary: Set of activities addressed to kindergarten and primary education. There are four types of activities: Put in order Hear, record and compare Objects definitions Memory

entry.title: El Romanticismo musical
entry.summary: Set of activities about the musical Romantic period (19th century): authors nationality works the orchestras

entry.title: Mystery project
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to secondary education with vocabulary about de mystery and the use of past simpleand past continuous.

entry.title: Wild animals
entry.summary: Project of activities about wild animals. The project has 6 parts: Mammals Fish Birds Reptiles / others Puzzles / word search About wild animals

entry.title: Clic d'anglès
entry.summary: Project of activities about English vocabulary addressed to the first cycle of primary education. The activities are structured into seven parts. In each group there are different activities: Identification of the vocabulary Voice-image Memory Writing words Put in order Review activities

entry.title: Aventura't amb l'ortografia - Nivell 3 (x, ix, tx, ig)
entry.summary: Aventura't amb l'ortografia is didactic a resource with three difficulty levels, with ten units for each level that can be used online at the edu365.cat. Each teaching unit begins with reading and listening of a story, a narrative, a statement, a poem... then presents several types of exercises to check reading and listening comprehension. There are activities for the expansion of vocabulary, deduction of orthography rules, exercises to set for the word orthography and syntax. It ends with evaluation activities with the objectives of the unit. Aventura't amb l'ortografia - Nivell 1 Aventura't amb l'ortografia - Nivell 2

author.name: Anna Pujol Brunet, Carme Camprubí Maya, Elisabeth Badia Escola, Gemma Vicente Rodrigo, Laia Escoté Lluís i Mònica Grau Prieto

entry.title: Aventura't amb l'ortografia - Nivell 3 (Essa 1)
entry.summary: Aventura't amb l'ortografia is didactic a resource with three difficulty levels, with ten units for each level that can be used online at the edu365.cat. Each teaching unit begins with reading and listening of a story, a narrative, a statement, a poem... then presents several types of exercises to check reading and listening comprehension. There are activities for the expansion of vocabulary, deduction of orthography rules, exercises to set for the word orthography and syntax. It ends with evaluation activities with the objectives of the unit. Aventura't amb l'ortografia - Nivell 1 Aventura't amb l'ortografia - Nivell 2

entry.summary: Aventura't amb l'ortografia is didactic a resource with three difficulty levels, with ten units for each level that can be used online at the edu365.cat. entry.summary: Project of activities about Catalan language: the separation of syllables the separation of digraph the identification of the tonic syllable of a word

entry.summary: Project activities to recognize the trees we have in the school: vulgar names and scientific ones Features Curiosities

entry.summary: Set of activities about volleyball: origins technique: serve, pass and kill shot tactic
