entry.title: El ninot de neu
entry.summary: Project of activities with typical vocabulary about Christmas, the winter and the snowman Christmas: typical elements of Christmas, stars, toys, zambomba, gifts, Christmas tree ... Parts of the snowman... Winter: cold, snow, gloves, scar...

entry.title: El carter
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about the postman. The project has nine activities of different types like associations, puzzles, relations, numeration... about this job.

entry.title: Multiplicación y división de monomios
entry.summary: Project activities addressed to secondary education about the operations with monomials. The project has two parts: Multiplying monomials Dividing monomials

entry.title: English activities (To have got)
entry.summary: Three projects of activities about English language addressed to pupils at last courses of primary education: To be To have got Comparatives and superlatives

entry.title: English activities (To be)
entry.summary: Three projects of activities about English language addressed to pupils at last courses of primary education: To be To have got Comparatives and superlatives

entry.title: English activities (Comparatives and superlatives)
entry.summary: Three projects of activities about English language addressed to pupils at last courses of primary education: To be To have got Comparatives and superlatives

entry.title: Funciones
entry.summary: JClic Project with 42 activities divided in two parts. The first one contains activities about domain, range, types of functions, image and inverse image, symmetry. asymptotes, reverse function, translation, continuity, derive function, relative edges, cut off, monotony, curvature and inflection point. The second one contains activities to calculate limits, derivation and immediate integrals.

entry.title: Funcions
entry.summary: JClic Project with 42 activities divided in two parts. The first one contains activities about domain, range, types of functions, image and inverse image, symmetry. asymptotes, reverse function, translation, continuity, derive function, relative edges, cut off, monotony, curvature and inflection point. The second one contains activities to calculate limits, derivation and immediate integrals.

entry.title: Millorem la intel·ligència
entry.summary: Project of activities aimed to improve the intellectual capacity of pupils. The project has 4 sections: Verbal intelligence Logic intelligence Calculation intelligence Spatial intelligence

entry.title: La bicicleta
entry.summary: Project of activities about different types of bikes and its photographs. The project has four different parts: Parties Road safety Modalities Clothing

entry.title: Ramon Llull
entry.summary: Project of activities about the live and the work of Ramon Llull: Blanquerna Llibre de les bèsties Llibre de gentil i tres savis Arbre de ciència Llibre d'amic i amat ...

entry.title: La generación del 98
entry.summary: Project of activities about the Generación del 98 authors: Antonio Machado José Benavente Azorín Juan Ramón Jiménez Miguel de Unamuno Valle Inclán ...

entry.title: Les plantes
entry.summary: Project of activities oriented to primary education about plants Several topics are addressed along the project: Plant parts and its classification Respiration and photosynthesis Nutrition Reproduction

entry.title: Nombres parells i senars
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to the first cycle of primary school about the differentiation of pairs and odds.

entry.title: Les cèl·lules
entry.summary: Project of activities about the cells morphology: The cells Eukaryotic and prokaryotic cells Recognition and function of the cellular organelles

entry.title: Introducción a la trigonometría
entry.summary: Set of activities on trigonometry. The project is divided into seven parts: History Angular measurement systems Arc and area length Trigonometric rules Notable angles Trigonometric angles rules of any magnitude Trigonometric identities

entry.title: Christmas
entry.summary: Project of activities in English language about Christmas. The package has different types of activities about: Reading Listening Writing

entry.title: El sistema informàtic
entry.summary: Project of activities about computers: Hardware Software Input and output peripherals Memory types: RAM and ROM Connections of computers Filestypes: .mp3, .avi...

entry.title: Volem pa amb oli!
entry.summary: Project of JClic activities focused on healthy nutrition, traditional and home-made food to teach it at kindergarten, P3 level, and to do a practical and written work at the classroom. In the next kindergarten level, P4, the activities are done at the computer classroom.

entry.title: Ordenacions i sèries
entry.summary: JClic project with two different parts: ordinations with fruits and fruit series with numbers lower than 50

entry.title: The animals
entry.summary: JClic project activities for the area of English language about wild animals. The project has 16 different types of activities: associations, word order, scrambled lyrics, crossword puzzles, and so on.

entry.title: La geometria
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to infantile education with activities about geometry. The project has two parts: Two dimensions Three dimensions

entry.title: Coloraines
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten based on the tale Coloraines written by Ferran Hortigüela Bodi of La Galera Publishing House. The project has two parts, the first one to read the tale and the second one with activities about the tale.

entry.title: L'hivern
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about the winter. Throughout the project we can find activities about different aspects related to the station, the cold, animals that hibernate, the population of Arbúcies (Catalonia), the clothes we use in winter, etc.

entry.title: Microorganismes i malalties
entry.summary: Set of activities about micro-organisms and infectious diseases. It's aimed to explain the agents that can cause illnesses and the different ways to get an infection. The activities also deal with the immune system and how it works and how to prevent and treat infectious diseases.

entry.title: Sistema sexagesimal
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to secondary education about the sexagesimal system and operations with complex numbers. The project has three different parts.

entry.title: Matemáticas y realidad
entry.summary: Project of activities with 4 sections where daily situation are related with mathematics in order to disclose to pupils the maths that are round them, for instance, mathematics and trade, mathematics and music, mathematics and mass media... Several topics are treated across the activities like decimal numbers, fractions, integers, proportions, Thales' theorem, statistics... Transversal topics are also dealed like road safety education, consumer education...

author.name: Ascensión Preciado Bravo, Juan Chacón Jerez, María de la Paz Pérez Rodríguez, María del Mar Mota Medina, María José Moreno Bayort i Raquel Muñoz Vara

entry.title: La matèria 3r d'ESO
entry.summary: Activities about aggregation states of matter: Mixtures and solutions Types of solutions Techniques to separate mixtures and solutions

entry.title: Peixos
entry.summary: Project addressed to infantile education, mainly for children of 4 or 5 years old due to the project has activities with text content. The activities are also complemented with sounds. The project is divided into two parts. One is more playful while the other deals with the fish body parts and few basic characteristics. Moreover, it's also shown the differences between aquarium fishes and fishes from a fish shop.

entry.title: Balenes i altres animals marins
entry.summary: Project of activities about sea animals. This project has activities like puzzles, associations, memory games, scrambled letters... The project has two parts: Aquatic mammals Aquatic animals

entry.title: Els esports
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to primary education. The project has six parts: Sports and heath Individual sports Team sports Concepts Sports equipment Sports (evaluation)

entry.title: Vols aprovar les mates?
entry.summary: Maths activities about algebra and arithmetic with numerical games and math's curiosities. Through the package the child will learn some memorable quotes of the best mathematicians in history, that allow us access to the following screens.

entry.title: La xocolata
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about chocolate. In this JCic project there are activities about Maths, Languages, ordering series and letters, associate sounds with written words, etc...

entry.title: El cos
entry.summary: JClic project with some activities about the human body. Through the package there are activities about associations, puzzles, identification, memory activities...

entry.title: El joc dels colors
entry.summary: The play of colours is meant for children from infantile education (p3) and special education who do not know neither colours nor letters. This project is divided in ten parts. To know, recognize and work with colour. It not required to make all parts at the same time. The colours' song Introduction activity. Jan sings the colours' song. Yellow, red, blue and green. A pdf file is available for downloading. Exploring the colours Sorting activities. Find the colours in a beach. It's useful for an initial evaluation. Make the puzzle Activity to learn the shapes. Firstly, the activity shows the drawing thereafter shows the colours. An audio record introduces the drawings. We make sure that children know how to relate using the mouse. Coupling game Activity which helps to relate and discriminate the same drawings. Know the pictures and the colours Activity which links shape and colour. Paint the shade Activity which links the shadow of each drawing with its shape and colour. Pick up the brush and paint …

author.name: Enric J. López, Imma Palahí i Maria Borrell

entry.title: Music languages and TIC
entry.summary: Global and interdisciplinary work about music, languages (English, Catalan and Spanish) and IT which includes three themes: The Beatles, Lluis Llach and Joan Manel Serrat in order to work at the music classroom for the third level of secondary school. This educational material has been done and assessed thanks to a type A study leave from the education department. The materials have been firstly evaluated by a discussion group in a CRP (educational resource center).

entry.title: L'espai i els planetes
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarden about the space and the planets. There are eight activities to learn the name of the planets and some vocabulary about the space like: astronaut spaceship moon star

entry.title: 26 coses de la classe
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to adults education about 26 different class objects in Catalan. pencil draft chalk computer...

entry.title: El nom
entry.summary: Set of activities in Catalan about "names". The project is addressed to secondary education. The images and sounds have been extracted of the Banco de imágenes del MECD website.

entry.title: Xoga coa auga e coa música
entry.summary: Project of activities with associations, puzzles, memory activities, scrambled letters, identification... About some works and their composers.

author.name: Antoni Vilalta Carrera i Olga Valls Garcia

entry.title: Juga amb l'aigua i la música
entry.summary: Project of activities with associations, puzzles, memory activities, scrambled letters, identification... About some works and their composers.

author.name: Antoni Vilalta Carrera i Olga Valls Garcia

entry.title: Les eines de l'hort
entry.summary: Project of activities that deals with the vocabulary of the farming tools used at school's vegetable garden. It includes information pages and puzzles supported by images and sounds of the different farming tools.

entry.title: Deportes alternativos
entry.summary: Project with several activities related to four alternative sport games: ultimate, indiaca, baseball and floorball. The project aim is to introduce these sports to secondary school pupils

entry.title: El vi de la DOQ Priorat
entry.summary: Project of activities about wine from the Priorat Qualified Denomination of Origin addressed to Primary and Secondary school. Throughout the project, several types of grape are shown as well as several grape crop methods and concepts like grafting, pruning, grape picking ...are introduced.

entry.title: Les tres erres
entry.summary: Project of activities about recycling. Throughout the activities, children should help "cubis" to find their colours, the material they collect, their names, etc... The thread of the activities is a tale which sensitize and recall the three R rule: recycle, reduce and re-use.

entry.title: Daily Routines
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to secondary education about the Present simple. The project has two parts: Vocabulary: Daily Routines Grammar: Present Simple

entry.title: La llegenda dels gegants de Sant Pol
entry.summary: Project of activities about the giants of Sant Pol de Mar in Catalonia: Mercè de la Murtra and Ben Hassat. The project has four parts: Tale Puzzles Information Text activities

entry.title: Els Cargols - P3, P4 i P5
entry.summary: Project activities addressed to infantile education which includes puzzles, numbers, reading, writing, associations, relationships... About the snails. The project has three parts, one for each of the courses of kindergarden: P3, P4 and P5.

entry.title: Ela arbres
entry.summary: Set of activities about trees. It consists of two parts: The first part's aim is to learn and identify deciduous and evergreen trees. The second part's aim is to learn about the elm, the olive, the eucalyptus and the white mulberry.

entry.title: Animalets petits del nostre entorn
entry.summary: Project of activities about small animals that we found in spring. The project has two parts: small animals (ladybug, butterfly, ant and snail) forest's birds (swallow, hoopoe, nightingale and partridge)

author.name: Maria Torres Español Veu: Roger Llurda

entry.title: Antoni Tàpies
entry.summary: Project of activities about the Antoni Tàpies' artwork. The project is divided into 2 main sections: Artist's artwork. 46 works Activities to do: Puzzles Association games Memory games The reproduction of the illustrations in this activity use the right to quote with educational purposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Department of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

entry.title: El pingüí de Humboldt
entry.summary: JClic activities about the Humboldt penguin. The package contains 30 activities. It's divided into 5 sections. Across these sections is shown the penguin main features, its nutrition, reproduction and habitat. It's also highlighted that is a specie in danger due to its declining population.

entry.title: Joan Miró
entry.summary: Project of activities focused on the painter Joan Miró The project has 40 activities and it's structured in 7 sections. One section is dedicated to the painter's biography, four sections are dedicated to 4 paintings, another one presents the sculpture artwork and the last one is referred to the Miró Foundation. All the biographic and graphical resources come mainly from the Miró Foundation in Barcelona. The reproduction of the illustrations in this activity use the right to quote with educational purposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Department of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

entry.title: El Bages
entry.summary: Set of 45 JClic activities about the region of Bages addressed to primary education. The activities are classified into three sections or blocks.

entry.title: Les plantes del pati
entry.summary: Project of activities about plants that can be found in the school CEIP Marià Cubí i Soler of Malgrat de Mar. The project has been created as a complement of the information available on the website of the school about this subject. It is divided into three sections: Trees, Shrubs and Other plants. Also, each of these three blocks has two parts: activities and information for each plant.

author.name: Miquel Jiménez Rodríguez Col·laboració: Jordi Ginesta Casas

entry.title: Consells davant emergències
entry.summary: Project of activities to publicize advices and information about emergency situations while it's also taught the prevention culture in emergency events.

entry.title: Els dofins
entry.summary: Project of activities to learn the dolphins' morphological features as well as its lifestyle and the types of this peculiar mammals. We can find exploring and identification activities, puzzles, text activities, simple and complex associations and memory games.

entry.title: Els colors a educació infantil (adaptat per a baixa visió)
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about the colours. The project has been thought to learn the name of the primary colours and some secondary colours. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Els colors a educació infantil
entry.summary: Project of activities addressed to kindergarten about the colours. The project has been thought to learn the name of the primary colours and some secondary colours. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Refranes y modismos
entry.summary: Project that deals with the Spanish subject addressed to the first level of secondary school and pupils learning Spanish as a second language. The project goal is to progressively introduce the proverb analysis and Spanish set phrases as well as their presence in the literature taking as starting point the top work of Cervantes.

entry.title: Estudio global de funciones
entry.summary: Activities about functions: concept, domain and image, axis, monotony, asymptotes, symmetries...

entry.title: Mitosi-Meiosi
entry.summary: Project of activities about mitosis and meiosis. The aim of these activities is to differentiate both processes through association exercises, complete text, delbmarc letters...

entry.title: El compostatge
entry.summary: Set of activities that deals with composting: organic material collection, composting device and the organism which perform the work of decomposing. The project is divided in 4 sections address to different education levels : Infantile education First level of primary schoool Second level of primary school Third level of primary school.

author.name: Miguel Sedano Martínez i Sònia Gómez Ortega

entry.title: Xogando con Matilda
entry.summary: Set of activities based on the book Matilda by Roald Dahl addressed to pupil of secondary education. The reproduction of the illustrations and texts in this activity use the right to quote with educational purposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Department of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

author.name: Joaquina Pérez Alonso i Marga Tarrío Pillado

entry.title: Estimulación visual
entry.summary: Set of activities aimed at visual stimulation. It's been designed to pupils with some kind of visual disability that have enough visual perception to read and write. The application contains two parts: "Vamos a ver" and "Letras y palabras". Both parts have exercises meant to stimulate the vision dealing with aspects like perceptual constancy, figure-background discrimination, visual memory, etc...The second part basically contains letters and words. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Les dents
entry.summary: Project of activities with puzzles, numbers, reading and writinG activities, matchING activities... about teeth and dental hygiene as well as nutrinional habits.

entry.title: Reciclem
entry.summary: Set of activities to infantile education about recycling of paper, crystal and packages. In the project there are association activities, match activities, puzzles, etc...

entry.title: Capbussa't en la música

The reproduction of the illustrations by Hergé in this activity use the right to quote with educational puposes established in the article 32 of the legal decree 1/1996 from the 12th of April (BOE n. 97, April 22nd). The Departmen of Education does not own the authoring right derived.

entry.title: La selva
entry.summary: Game to introduce the topic of the jungle. It deals with the animal names, the places where they live and the fruits and transports. It's a fantastic trip driven by our friends from ¿The Jungle Book¿. This project is addressed to children at infantile education.

entry.title: Jocs tradicionals valencians
entry.summary: Set of activities addressed to pupils at the second and third level of primary school. The main objectives are: to publicize the Valencian Traditional Games (VTG) and its social-cultural implications on the children through the new technologies and to incorporate the VTG in the children usual games. The section Know the games it mainly contains text and puzzles which provide the required information to carry out the package. The section Let's play! it contains crosswords, letter soups, image associations, etc which will help to reinforce the learning. To extend the contents shown in the package, it can be looked up the webquest Gymcana of the Valencian traditional games at the following web address: http://intercentres.cult.gva.es/cpvergedelfonament

entry.title: Les fruites 2

entry.title: Llengua valenciana 4t primària

It has been designed as a complement for the textbook Llengua 4t Obri la porta, Comunitat Valenciana from Anaya publishing group. The project contains fifteen topics (the same as the textbook) with activities that can be played by 1 or 2 players.

This project deals with the classroom vocabulary: closet, chair, ballpoint pen, chalkboard, board rubber, computer, key, table . .

entry.title: Música del segle XIX
entry.summary: Project of activities about the music of the 19th century. The activities deal with orchestral pieces (symphony, symphonic poem, ballet, and suite), musical instruments found in the orchestras. composers (Beethoven, Chopin, Liszt, Schumann and Mendelssohn) and five opera (Aida, La Traviata, Carmen, The barber of Sevilla and Tannhäuser).

entry.title: Les primeres consonants
entry.summary: This project of JClic activities is addressed to pupils with difficulties in writing and reading. It has also been included dactylology for the deaf pupils. It can used with pupils of primary school to work reading and writing using the first consonants (l, p, m, s, n). The sequence by the letters and words are shown follows the same order as the Estel collection.

entry.title: Pronunciem
entry.summary: The project PRONUNCIEM contains a set of didactic and interactive activities addressed to foreign pupils of secondary school to introduce them in the basic pronunciation of central catalan. The activities deal with the sound identification as well as its pronunciation by means of repetition and imitation. The project Pronunciem includes didactic pronunciation newnesses due to the fact of balancing the relevance between catalan suprasegments (accent, intonation) and specific segments(vowels, consonants) in order to enable the pupils identify the characteristic features of the catalan language. The activities are shown in two differentiated sections: The first section deals with the SUPRASEGMENT ELEMENTS, accent and intonation. The second section deals with the CATALAN PHONEME ARTICULATION, the vowels (stressed, unstressed) and the catalan consonants, either isolated or into context.

entry.title: Los mecanismos
entry.summary: Set of activities about the mechanisms addressed to secondari education. Good part of the activities as well as figures and some graphs, are picked up in the book Tecnología de 2º curso de la ESO of the Oxford Publishing house and of the books of Tecnología de ESO of the Bruño Publishing house.

The project contains many types of activities to play and to get in touch with images, songs, sounds, text,etc. in order to understand the value of the communication through our feelings and non-verbal language.

entry.title: Judo (nague-waza)

entry.title: Temps de temps: Vents i ventots
entry.summary: The sixth part of the serial has the wind as main topic covering usual and wild behaviour. Through the first part of the package, centred in Catalonia, the pupils learn the wind naming according to the origin as well as its main features. It's also explained the wind intensity and direction from meteorological maps and it's disclosed the Beafort scale. Next, the package is focused in the wild phenomena of the wind: the hurricanes and tornados. The package deals with the causes, features, structure and the measurement scales followed by curious associated facts like country naming and some freak anecdotes. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, La previsió meteorològica, Observem i mesurem, A bots i barrals and Llamp de rellamp.

Additionally, there are some exercises to use and distinguish the partitive article.

entry.title: Los primeros números por vía visual directa (Segunda parte)
entry.summary: This Clic package aims to teach children the numbers using common elements of the school like the Cuisenarie rules, fingers, dice dots... There are up to 7 set of activities. Both first deals with groups of 4 numbers (1,4 and 2,5). The activity change is automatic, it can be done by young child. The three following ones are groups of 6 numbers, from1 to 8. Both last are groups of 9 numbers(1,9 and 2,10). It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: La materia, un estudio educativo
entry.summary: Activities though to tell the difference between several material system using a qualitative approach. Starting from its aspect till being able to differentiate between pure substances and mixtures as well as elements and compounds reaching to a easily understanding of the atomic theory. This package also deals with simple separation techniques for heterogeneous mixtures and dissolutions. Finally, there are activities to learn the different stages of the matter and its naming

entry.title: Les fruits
entry.summary: Activities about fruits addressed to kinder garden and primary school.

entry.title: Frutas
entry.summary: Activities about fruits addressed to kinder garden and primary school.

entry.title: Los cinco sentidos
entry.summary: Clic activities about senses: smell taste touch sight hearing

entry.title: Geometría plana (español)
entry.summary: Project of activities about geometry. There are activities about angles, polygons, lines, triangles, the perimeter...

entry.title: Geometria plana (català)
entry.summary: Project of activities about geometry. There are activities about angles, polygons, lines, triangles, the perimeter...

entry.title: Les quatre estacions d'Antonio Vivaldi
entry.summary: JClic activities about Antonio Vivaldi's work "The four seasons". The project has three parts: The Tale The music The instruments The composer The activities are on the subject of listening the concerto, about the orchestra's string instruments and the composer, Antonio Vivaldi.

entry.title: Minibasket
entry.summary: Clic activities about mini basketball. The project has two parts: Rules Tactics

entry.title: Nivelación restitutiva
entry.summary: Package of activities which belongs to the Program Secondary School for everyone developed by Chilean Ministry of Education. This program aims to keep young people at secondary school in order to reach a broader offer in education as well as to get the 12 years of schooling. The program Secondary School for everyone is carried out at the most problematic schools. This package contains several mathematical problems to be solved by pupils.

entry.title: I aleshores no en quedà cap (Deu negrets)
entry.summary: Clic activities about Agatha Christie's Ten Little Niggers.

entry.title: La organización política y social de Andalucía
entry.summary: Set of activities addressed to Adult Education pupils. Its purpose is to consolidate and to complement the knowledge about the institutions and the most exemplifying symbols of the Andalusia Autonomous Community.

entry.title: Actividades económicas de Andalucía
entry.summary: Clic activities about Andalusia's economy.

entry.title: Les flors de camp i de jardí
entry.summary: Activities addressed to primary school about the flowers. The project has two parts: Garden flowers Field flowers

entry.title: La pintura a finales del siglo XIX y principios del siglo XX
entry.summary: Clic activities about de postimpressionist painting and the most popular painters and artistic styles like Cézanne, Munch, Gouguin, Van Gogh, Tolouse-Lautrec, Picasso, Miró, etc.

author.name: Coia Jansà i Rafael Delcazo Aced

entry.title: Mi primer quijote
entry.summary: Clic activities about El Quijote based on the book Mi primer Quijote by the Espasa publishing house.

entry.title: Actitudes, valores y noviolencia en la educación física y el deporte
entry.summary: Clic activities about attitudes and values in physical education addressed to primary school.

entry.title: Gaudí
entry.summary: Set of association activities focused on the learning and recognizing some of the most important works of Antoni Gaudi.

author.name: Gemma Grifé, Montse Sitjes, Rosa M. Obradors Puigdellívol i Teresa Esteban

entry.title: Gaudí: Dracs
entry.summary: Clic activities about Antonio Gaudí's dragons.

entry.title: Els carboners
entry.summary: Packages of activities created at the educational training camp of Orient (Mallorca), splitted into 3 parts: Coal merchant Coal cellar The coal merchant's song In addition to this, there are other three projects created at the educational training camps of Mallorca: El salobrar Els animals (ISO image).

entry.title: El salobrar
entry.summary: Packages of activities created at the educational training camp of Es Palmer (Mallorca), splitted into 3 parts: Birds Plants Pools In addition to this, there are other three projects created at the educational training camps of Mallorca: Els carboners Els animals (ISO image).

author.name: Martí J. Fornés i Pere B. Morey

entry.title: Descobrim la teoria de conjunts!
entry.summary: Package of activities about the set theory. First of all it's shown the main ideas, the essential vocabulary, set representation by Venn diagrams, the set definition... At the end, there are exercises focused on the three main set operations: joint, intersection and subtraction.

entry.title: Un viatge pel món dels enters
entry.summary: Activities about integers. The theory is explained through text activities and puzzles. Additionally, there are mental calculus activities with increasing difficulty and activities about the divisibility theory.

entry.title: Descobrim la trigonometria
entry.summary: The aim of this activity is to develop the most basic notions of trigonometry and the mathematical knowledge needed in order to completely understand the activity. This package of activities won the award of the "Premis CIRIT 2004" and the first award in the science field of Cornellà (Barcelona).

entry.title: Caperucita Roja 2
entry.summary: Activity pack about the children's story The Little Red Riding Hood. The package has 11 parts with activities about comprehension, the tail, riddles, verbs, articles, etc.

author.name: Elisabeth Freixa Armengol, Maribel Villagrasa García i Marta Roca Fajarnés Dibuixos: Enric Balaguer Roca

entry.title: La Caputxeta Vermella 2
entry.summary: Activity pack about the children's story The Little Red Riding Hood. The package has 11 parts with activities about comprehension, the tail, riddles, verbs, articles, etc.

author.name: Elisabeth Freixa Armengol, Maribel Villagrasa García i Marta Roca Fajarnés Dibuixos: Enric Balaguer Roca

entry.title: Plasgeo 1
entry.summary: Plasgeo1 is a package of activities whose aim is to approach geometry to pupils of Plastic and Visual arts education. It's an adaptation of the Geoclic program addressed to the first course of secondary School. Plasgeo1 differs from Geoclic in its presentation, structure and activities. It's divided into 3 main sections: the line, the angles and polygons. Each section contains a theorical part (concepts) and a practical part (basic tracing).

entry.title: Personajes del Quijote
entry.summary: Clic activities in Spanish about the Don Quixote's characters.

entry.title: Bufar i fer ampolles: dites i frases fetes catalanes
entry.summary: Clic activities about Catalan proverbs and sayings.

entry.title: Coneixement del medi social 3r de primària (12 - El pas del temps)
entry.summary: This material is part of a large collection of activities that cover all the Catalan curriculum of social and experimental sciences for primary school. The project, created by Joan Verdaguer i Andrès, has been carried out thanks to a sabbatical year granted by the Catalan Ministry of Education (DOGC 3926 - 16/07/03). This set of activities of social sciences, addressed to pupils 8 years old, has 12 units: The landscape The city The town The city hall Work at the countryside The industry The services The communication media El pas del temps The work before and now Holidays during the year The past of the place where I live The material is complemented with the activities for 6-7 years, natural sciences 8, natural sciences 9, natural sciences 10, natural sciences 11, social sciences 9, social sciences 10 and social sciences 11.

entry.title: Temps de temps: Llamp de rellamp
entry.summary: The fifth package of the series is centred in the storms. The focus is in electrical phenomena that occur during a storm: thunders and flashes of lighting. We discover many curious aspects like how the flashes of lighting happen, what kind of consequences can occur, how we can protect ourselves and how far the storm is from us. The last activities are about hailstorms. It's also shown how the hailstorms occur and many other curious information. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, Observem i mesurem, La previsió meteorològica, A bots i barrals and Vents i ventots.

entry.title: Temps de temps: La previsió meteorològica
entry.summary: The weather forecast shown everyday on TV introduce us into meteorology. We learn to distinguish between cold or warm front or to understand several types of weather maps: isobaric, radar, temperature... and by the meantime we learn the isobaric lines, the relationship between the winds and the fronts, the meaning of the areas of low or high pressures, the baric gradient ... At the end, We are able to relate several weather forecast looking at different types of weather maps. Let's say, we become somehow a weathermen/weatherwomen. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, Observem i mesurem, A bots i barrals, Llamp de rellamp and Vents i ventots.

entry.title: Actividades de demonstração do JClic
entry.summary: The main objective of this project is to show samples of the diverse types of activities and the main features of JClic. The project is organized in two parts: first, there is a sequence for each one of the basic types of activities (puzzles, associations, scrambled letters, crossword and text activities). In the second part there is a review of the new features of JClic compared to the previous version, Clic 3.0.

entry.title: Informática básica (El escritorio de MS Windows)
entry.summary: Clic activities about the main parts of the computer: central unit, peripherals, software... and some things about interenet and Windows.

entry.title: Geografía de México
entry.summary: Clic activities about political geography of Mexico. It contains: State location Memorize the state capitals.

entry.title: Estados y capitales de México
entry.summary: Package of activities focused on puzzles and letter soups about the states of Mexico and its capitals.

entry.title: Comp-Juega
entry.summary: "Comp-Jugar" contains theory and activities about the conjugation of the Spanish regular verbs: personal and non-personal forms, model verb conjugation. It¿s addressed to secondary school.

entry.title: Las ocho capitales de provincia de Andalucía
entry.summary: Set of activities about the 8 most important cities of the region of Andalusia, in Spain, and their more emblematic monuments, buildings and places.

entry.title: Geografía, los departamentos de Perú
entry.summary: Clic activities about geography of Peru.

entry.title: Homenaje a Jorge Oteiza y Eduardo Chillida
entry.summary: This package wants to be a tribute to two great basque artists: Jorge Oteiza and Eduardo Chillida. It deals with the most significant aspects of their biographies, the conceptual and aesthetic foundation of their work and a review to their most important projects and creations.

entry.title: Divisiones (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.summary: Package of activities about the division with different levels of difficulty. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Divisiones
entry.summary: Package of activities about the division with different levels of difficulty. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: La división
entry.summary: Clic activities about divisions, for Primary School.

entry.title: La calesita del bosque (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.summary: This package is about "La calesita del bosque", a Berta Finckel 's tale. The activity is addressed to pupils of Primary School. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: La calesita del bosque
entry.summary: This package is about "La calesita del bosque", a Berta Finckel 's tale. The activity is addressed to pupils of Primary School. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Lengua castellana
entry.summary: Spanish activities about some works of three writers: Günter Grass Antonio Machado Lope de Vega

entry.title: La tortuga taruga (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.summary: Package of activities based on the educational resources software developed by the Chile Education Ministry. Inside this package there are grammar and reading comprehension activities. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: La tortuga taruga
entry.summary: Package of activities based on the educational resources software developed by the Chile Education Ministry. Inside this package there are grammar and reading comprehension activities. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Lee y diviértete
entry.summary: This program treats about the phonemes g, j, r and rr. It's very visual and it contains several sound files in order to facilitate pupils their learning avoiding possible reading difficulties.

entry.title: Alfabeto de señas mexicano
entry.summary: Package of activities about the Mexican sign language oriented to child with hearing handicap.

entry.title: Poesía para educación primaria (Rubén Darío)
entry.summary: Two packages of activities about poets in order to practise the reading comprehension at the Primary school. The major aim is the memory training through the poetry. The first package contains the Ruben Darío poetry The second has José Ángel Valiente and Camilo José Cela poetry.

entry.title: Poesía para educación primaria (José Ángel Valiente y Camilo José Cela)
entry.summary: Two packages of activities about poets in order to practise the reading comprehension at the Primary school. The major aim is the memory training through the poetry. The first package contains the Ruben Darío poetry The second has José Ángel Valiente and Camilo José Cela poetry.

entry.title: El gallo y el carámbano
entry.summary: El Gallo y el Carámbano is a package of activities for reading comprehension to Primary school. Based on the tale named ¿Cuentos al amor de la lumbre¿ II de A. R. Almodóvar. Anaya Publishers. 1st edition (2001) The images are extracted from Maxiloto Animaux, from Nathan Publishers.

author.name: Francisco García-Pozuelo Díaz i Juana Rello Serrano

entry.title: Hilo es hilo es...
entry.summary: Hilo es hilo es ... is a package of activities for reading comprehension based on riddles and memory capacity (puzzles).

entry.title: Rocas y minerales
entry.summary: Package about minerals and rocks. There are also activities about mines and quarries.

entry.title: Personas, animales y plantas
entry.summary: This package is based in the book Nuevo proyecto tierra, of SM Publishing house. The package is addressed to Primary school.

entry.title: Nacer
entry.summary: Clic activities addressed to Primary School. The aim of this package is study of the reproductive apparatuses and the processes of the pregnancy and the childbirth.

entry.title: Adentro, afuera (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.summary: Package of activities structured in two sections : Capacities: oral comprehension, visual perception, hearing perception and motor function control Skills: listen and perform instructions, directionality, visual memory, ocular motility, visual vocabulary, shape perception, hearing awareness, visual/hearing memory, hearing discernment and ocular-manual coordination. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Adentro, afuera
entry.summary: Package of activities structured in two sections : Capacities: oral comprehension, visual perception, hearing perception and motor function control Skills: listen and perform instructions, directionality, visual memory, ocular motility, visual vocabulary, shape perception, hearing awareness, visual/hearing memory, hearing discernment and ocular-manual coordination. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Jugando activo mi inteligencia
entry.summary: This package of activities is though for young kids. We can find puzzles, identification exercises, pairing, sort out sequences, associations, quantities, names, basic sums, word ending.

entry.title: Me divierto aprendiendo
entry.summary: This package of activities is though for young kids. It has exercises for sorting out sequences, puzzles, left-right identification, associations, vowels, quantities, names, simple sums and geometric figures.

entry.title: La calçotada
entry.summary: Package of activities about the "calçotada", a Catalan traditional celebration focused on the tasting of roasted sweet onions. The package has three sections: The menu of the "calçotada". The sauce. The parade.

entry.title: L'Estany de Banyoles
entry.summary: This third package complements the two previous : La comarca del Pla de l'Estany i a Banyoles ciutat. The last one specifically treats the Banyoles lake and its watering.

entry.title: ABC
entry.summary: Catalan reading activities, available in two formats: capitals or calligraphical letters. The images are in grey scale to visualize them in any type of computer. In order to see the calligraphical letters, the True-type font "Massallera" must be installed on the computer.

author.name: Núria Ramos Catà i Trinitat Colomer Font

entry.title: La comarca del Maresme
entry.summary: Clic activities about the catalan county of Maresme: Situation Population Relief Climate Rivers

entry.title: Els molins fariners
entry.summary: Clic activities destined to primary school. The activities are about the evolution of the grind technology, and about the operation of a hydraulic mill.

entry.title: Multiplica i multiplica
entry.summary: Clic activities about multiplication, for primary school.

entry.title: Els noms de la classe (P5)
entry.summary: The usage of the pupil's names is commonly used in Infantile education. Many activities can be done at the Infantile education using the identification of child name and its written representation . These Clic packages "The classroom names" follows this working line, starting from the child's photos taken at the beginning of the year. The activities are structured as follows: Observe. The name in capitals is shown clicking on the photos. Relate. A set of photos is shown to relate them with a names set. Write. Write down the names after selecting the group photo Capital and calligraphical letters. The two types should be related Letter Soup. Letter soups which contain six classmate names.

entry.title: Els noms de la classe (P3)
entry.summary: The usage of the pupil's names is commonly used in Infantile education. Many activities can be done at the Infantile education using the identification of child name and its written representation . These Clic packages "The classroom names" follows this working line, starting from the child's photos taken at the beginning of the year. The activities are structured as follows: Observe. The name in capitals is shown clicking on the photos. Relate. A set of photos is shown to relate them with a names set. Write. Write down the names after selecting the group photo Capital and calligraphical letters. The two types should be related Letter Soup. Letter soups which contain six classmate names.

entry.title: Lectoescriptura amb els fruits de la tardor
entry.summary: Package of activities for the reading/writting learning based on the autumn fruits: almond, hazelnut, chestnut, grenade, grape, pine nut, quince and khaki.

entry.title: Orientació acadèmica i professional
entry.summary: Package of activities about the vocational guidance : Job opportunities: . Set of activities aimed to present the several job opportunities after the schooling. Values, interests and personality. activities to work with the personality features, the individual interests and values Resources for the employment. activities directed to provide several curriculum forms, application letters, . . . in summary all the resources for the employment.

entry.title: Astremania
entry.summary: Package of activities about the space, heavenly bodies, planets... for the first level of Primary education. This package can be used as a review tool in higher levels.

entry.title: Joan Miró i els colors
entry.summary: This package of activities is about the complexity of the colours and its influence in the work of the catalan artist Joan Miró. It begins with exercises based on the book "The rainbow and the colours", of the Santillana Publishing house, and concludes with a virtual visit to the world of geometric figures and colours of Miró.

entry.title: Salvador Dalí (primària)
entry.summary: Two packages of activities about the Salvador Dalí work in remembrance of his centenary born. One of these packages is for Infantile education whereas the other one is for Primary school.

entry.title: Salvador Dalí (infantil)
entry.summary: Two packages of activities about the Salvador Dalí work in remembrance of his centenary born. One of these packages is for Infantile education whereas the other one is for Primary school.

entry.title: Salvador Dalí. Educació Infantil
entry.summary: Clic activities about Salvador Dalí addressed to Infantile Education. I the package there are three parts.

entry.title: Dalí: trencaclosques
entry.summary: This package has been though for Secondary school. It contains several puzzles, after its resolution a biographic piece of information about the painter is provided. Several soup letters are also included where

entry.title: PEMSA: Programa d'Entrenament Mental
entry.summary: Application of 62 packages of activities splitted out into three blocks according to the three levels of primary school. The objective is to develop and improve the basic psychological processes which afterwards will affect several areas of the academic curriculum (memory, attention, perception, observation, intuition, reasoning...). Each package is made up by ten activities where each pupil should check out his/her abilities. It¿s recommended to read the attached documentation for an optimal use of this package of activities

entry.title: Instruments i jugarolls musicals de les Pitiüses
entry.summary: Package of activities about folk musical instruments of two of the Balearic islands: Eivissa ("Ibiza", in Spanish) and Formentera.

author.name: Peligros Saura Ortiz i Virginia Sansano Roselló Col·laboració: Carme Frau Fotografies: Vicent Tur i Serra Veu: Vicent Marí Costa

entry.title: Temps de temps: A bots i barrals
entry.summary: From the fourth issue of the series, we will deepen in the most known meteorological phenomena: rain, storm and wind. This package is focused in the rains revealing its causes, undesirable effects (flooding) and recommendations to act correctly when we are suffering a flood. A short review of the most intense rains that affected the Catalan country. In these pages you will find the other parts of the serie: L'atmosfera, Observem i mesurem, La previsió meteorològica, Llamp de rellamp and Vents i ventots.

entry.title: Carnaval (puzzles)
entry.summary: Clic activities included in one of the SPC fairytales ( Fairytales with alternative and augmentative systems of communication) published in the portal www.edu365.com. This fairytale deals with vocabulary related to "Carnival", using elements of SPC and LSC.

author.name: Joan Antoja Mas i Òscar Morales

entry.title: Carnaval (SPC)
entry.summary: Clic activities included in one of the SPC fairytales ( Fairytales with alternative and augmentative systems of communication) published in the portal www.edu365.com. This fairytale deals with vocabulary related to "Carnival", using elements of SPC and LSC.

entry.title: Dalí
entry.summary: This package contains several activities related to Dalí. The aim is to easily learn his work and biography doing exercises.

entry.title: Zer dakizu paint programaz?
entry.summary: Package of activities about how to use the Windows application "Paint". The aim of the application is to learn how to use the icon tools located in the main screen of the program.

entry.title: ¿Cuánto sabes de Paint?
entry.summary: Package of activities about how to use the Windows application "Paint". The aim of the application is to learn how to use the icon tools located in the main screen of the program.

entry.title: El alfabeto griego
entry.summary: Clic activities about the Greek alphabet addressed to high school. The package has 4 parts about the name of the letters, the sounds, the capital letters and small letters and their transcription and transliteration. For more information you can visit this web: http://www.xtec.cat/~aperez19/

entry.title: L'alfabet grec
entry.summary: Clic activities about the Greek alphabet addressed to high school. The package has 4 parts about the name of the letters, the sounds, the capital letters and small letters and their transcription and transliteration. For more information you can visit this web: http://www.xtec.cat/~aperez19/

entry.title: English 6º
entry.summary: English Clic activities for primary school, based on a book from Richmond publishers.

entry.title: Petrés
entry.summary: Clic edited by the "Coordinadora d'Escoles en Valencià" of "Camp de Morvedre" county, in Valencia. It was made due to the VII festival of schools, done in Petrés in 2003. It has two sections : one with information about the town and another with puzzles and games.

entry.title: Un viaje al mundo del teatro
entry.summary: The package "Un viaje al mundo del teatro (siglos XVI-XVII)" is structured into four parts: IntroductionIt's focused on the European writers and its works: Moliere, Lope de Vega, Calderón de la Barca and Shakespeare. The Italian Commedia dell'arteIn this section is analysed this type of theatre (without previous text). The characters features (dresses, masks, condition, gesticulation, improvisation ... ) The Spanish comedia nacionalHere, the activities are centred in the open-air theatre as a scenic space, the genres which were performed as well as the attendees distribution according to its economical condition and sex. The Elizabethan theatreThis section is about Shakespeare's "The Globe" Theatre. Explaining some of its stage features.

entry.title: Tirant: El clic
entry.summary: This package tries to introduce the medieval Catalan novel "Tirant lo Blanc" to the students of the second level of secondary school. The package is organized in 5 sections: Argument Author Other authors The love Exercises

entry.title: Els números romans
entry.summary: Clic activities about roman numbers: rules, equivalences between decimal and roman numbers, current expressions where roman numbers are used, etc.

entry.title: Potencia
entry.summary: Package of activities about powers, with graphs, problems and combined exercises.

entry.title: Regles de derivació
entry.summary: Package of activities about the derivation rules. It's been thought for secondary education as a tool to review and learn these rules.

entry.title: London
entry.summary: Package of activities about English language centred in London. The contents of the package are: Learning of the vocabulary related with travelling. Speaking practise with a hotel / hostel receptionist. Reading and comprehension of texts about the London culture and history. Present perfect exercises. Contrast present perfect and simple past. Question tags exercises. Reading of a letter or a travel diary.

entry.title: Sustantivos y adjetivos
entry.summary: Package of language activities with simple and complex associations, text activities and puzzles The aim of these activities is to make the pupils apply the knowledge learned at the classroom.

entry.title: Numeritos
entry.summary: Package of activities for the second year of primary school. It contains exercises with two and three figure numbers. It's focused in: order reading and writing composition sum and subtraction bigger than, smaller than easy series

entry.title: Silabitas
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to the second year of primary school. It's a single package with exercises of splitting Spanish words into syllables, and sort words alphabetically.

entry.title: Els arbres de la nostra escola
entry.summary: Package of activities for kindergarten and primary school about the school's trees. The package is divided into 6 sections: The trees Tale Song Word search Riddle Poem

author.name: Àngels Surís Jordà i Mª Josep Guzmán

entry.title: Estadística en 3º de ESO
entry.summary: This package of activities starts with a review of some basic concepts needed for start working on statistics, and continues with easy problems about interpretation of data.

entry.title: TETRAVEX: Zenbakidun buruhausgarriak
entry.summary: Numeric puzzles using squares with one number in each side. In order to solve it, all the neighbouring sides must have the same number.

entry.title: TETRAVEX: Rompecabezas numéricos
entry.summary: Numeric puzzles using squares with one number in each side. In order to solve it, all the neighbouring sides must have the same number.

entry.title: Civilizaciones antiguas
entry.summary: This package of activities reviews how the Neolithic man evolved. The invention of writing and its development in the four main civilizations, their organization, how they live and the beliefs of the citizens from Egypt and Mesopotamia.

entry.title: La Grecia antigua
entry.summary: Package of activities about the ancient Greece, with exercises about: The regions of Greece The theatre The architecture The mythology The language

entry.title: La antigua Roma
entry.summary: Package of activities about the roman world and its legacy. The program has activities consisting in the virtual re-construction of some monuments of Rome.

entry.title: La vida de Claudio Arrau
entry.summary: Package of activities about Claudio Arrau's life, in commemoration of the first century of the born of this worldwide admired Chilean pianist. The package has two parts: first, some activities about Arrau's childhood, adolescence and adult life, and exercises about the most relevant aspects of they biography.

entry.title: Menjars, begudes i dolços catalans
entry.summary: Package of activities addressed to special education, kindergarten and primary school. The main aim is to learn the Catalan vocabulary related to food.

entry.title: Terra de gegants
entry.summary: Land of Giants is a clic made to approach children to the world of "gegants" (giants) and "capgrossos" (big-heads), very important figures in the Catalan folklore. The package has been made possible thanks to the co-operation of the Colla geganterra de Mollet del Vallès.

author.name: Agnès Vila Catalán, Montse Capdevila, Montserrat Alsina i Montserrat Pérez Dibuixos: Carla Aparicio Fotografies: Colla Gegantera de Mollet del Vallès

entry.title: Les vêtements
entry.summary: French language activities about the vocabulary related to cloths. The activities are organized in increasing difficulty. Each block starts with an exploration activity with audio in order to let to hear the pronunciation of the words, following with an association activity between images and words. The next part is based on image identification according to the sound heard. There are also puzzles and scrambled letters, included in the package in order to brighten up the activities.

entry.title: Classifiquem roques sedimentàries
entry.summary: Package of activities about sedimentary rocks. The package has two sections: The first one it's a introduction to the sedimentary rocks: main groups (dendritic, bio-chemical and organic rocks), how the rocks of these groups were created and its classification. The second section is a set of exercises about the learned concepts.

entry.title: Així sona...
entry.summary: This package is a set of activities addressed to pupils of primary school, based on the instruments of the symphonic orchestra. The pictures are taken from supermusics.

entry.title: Household, rooms and furniture
entry.summary: Clic activities about the English vocabulary related to the spaces and furniture of the house: Living-room, bathroom, dining-room, bedroom, kitchen, hall, garage, garden, fridge, sink, cooker, cupboard, shower, bath, washbasin, toilet, mirror, bed, armchair, wardrobe, chair, sofa, table and television.

entry.title: ETICLIC Llegim etiquetes
entry.summary: Package of 26 activities, based on the logos and labels of some commercial products, with three different typographies: capitals, roman and print letter. The activities deal with label recognition through the images, associations with the products, puzzles and scrambled letters.

entry.title: Lengua para 3r ciclo de primaria
entry.summary: Spanish activities for the third cycle of primary school. The activities are based on four texts: "Cuento de la cebolla", "Relato de los gritos" (Robert Fulghum), "Las abarcas desiertas" (Miguel Hernández) "El mercader de burros" (Idries Shan). Comprehension activities are proposed based on these texts. Additionally, some other activities (orthography, word classification, verb tenses and syntactic analysis) are included in other packages.

author.name: Laurentino Gómez i Moncho Marín Calvo

entry.title: La fiesta de Bubú Locomotoro
entry.summary: This package of activities has two section : the first one presents a Spanish tale to be readed. The second one offers several activities about comprehension.

entry.title: Zein da zein?
entry.summary: This activity has been developed for children of 3, 4 and 5 years-old. It consists in associate two draws : the first one is coloured and it's splitted into several pieces that are mixed up and located in different spatial positions, and the second one is a black and white draw. The difficulty is increased according to the pupil age.

author.name: Ana Mª Álvarez de Arcaya i Blanca Besga

entry.title: ¿Cuál es cuál?
entry.summary: This activity has been developed for children of 3, 4 and 5 years-old. It consists in associate two draws : the first one is coloured and it's splitted into several pieces that are mixed up and located in different spatial positions, and the second one is a black and white draw. The difficulty is increased according to the pupil age.

entry.title: Aniclic: método de lectura (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.summary: Aniclic is the Clic version of Animalitos, a reading/writing method for the Spanish culture and language. It was published in Germany in 1995. It follows the same sequence of phonemes and spelling of Animalitos, as well as the same teaching concept of reading. Aniclic should not be considered as a real reading whole method, but just a resource that complements the daily work. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Trabajar en el laboratorio de química
entry.summary: The activities of this application are directed to the learning of the basic material used in a chemical laboratory in order to do the practices properly. It's also remarked the safety rules needed in a school laboratory of chemistry: understand the chemical's pictograms, get used to work in a laboratory understanding that chemical assay can be dangerous if all the safety measures are not considered.

Processing of information.

entry.title: Grups consonàntics PL, BL, FL, GL, CL
entry.summary: This package of activities is addressed to Infantile or Primary school (pupils who have difficulties with the pronunciation, writing or discriminating those words which contain the following consonantal groups: pl, bl, fl, gl, cl). The package is made of gradual activities with words containing these consonantal groups located at the beginning and in the middle of the words. According to the activity, auditory help is also provided.

entry.summary: This is a package of activities about the Classic Greece. It's divided in four sections : The country Gods and myths Polis and politics Artists and philosophers

entry.summary: Package of activities about the Catalan Sign Language. The package contains several videos with the signs of colours, months, days...

entry.title: Diccionem
entry.summary: DICCIONEM is a Clic activities about the use of the dictionary. The activities are addressed to 2nd Cycle of Primary school. The objectives of the application are: To know the different types of dictionaries. To reinforce the knowledge of the dictionary as a basic search engine. To reinforce the understanding of definitions. To identify different meanings of the same word. To identify words that cannot be found in the dictionary. To avoid the use of incorrect words. To enrich the vocabulary. To make pleasant and playful the use of the school dictionary.

entry.title: Transportes
entry.summary: The programme ¿Transportes¿ appeared to help pupils of Infantile and Primary school stressing those with special education needs. This package is focused on the more common means of transport : terrestrial, by sea or by air. A help file with a technical and didactic guide can be downloaded.

entry.title: Fatima
entry.summary: Package of activities with two major aims: learn English and peace. The package is structured around the experience of one girl from Morocco that leaves her country and come to Barcelona. The different stages are : Why does she leave ? How does she come ? What happens as an illegal emigrant ? How does her situation evolve? What type of future will she have ?

entry.title: Monedas de Gran Bretaña y de EUA

The activities make use of graphics representing all the different coins for easy recognition for the student. The activities are varied and include text and graphic associations, written response, crosswords,...

entry.title: Geoclic (italiano)
entry.summary: Geoclic is a group of 500 geometry activities grouped in 40 packs. This activities are designed for high school students and can be used as part of the curriculum or as complement to the class work. GeoClic english adaptation has been done with the support of the Socrates-Minerva Programme Project V.I.M.(116338 - CP - 1 - 2004 - 1 - IT - MINERVA - MPP)

entry.summary: Package of activities about main rules of the use of the capital letters in Spanish. All the activities has an information screen before. In some activities several rules are mixed. The package can be used by all curses in Primary and Secondary school.

entry.title: La acentuación (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.summary: Clic activities destined to learn Spanish language. The activity has only one package where we learn the different kinds of words in Spanish: oxytones paroxytones proparoxytones It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: La acentuación
entry.summary: Clic activities destined to learn Spanish language. The activity has only one package where we learn the different kinds of words in Spanish: oxytones paroxytones proparoxytones It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Palabras, sílabas y acentuación
entry.summary: Package of activities directed to learn to accentuate the words, knowing the diphthongs and hiatuses and following the norms of the R.A.E. de la Lengua. Throughout the package also child are remembering and learning these norms.

entry.title: Sinónimos y antónimos
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish language destined to learn synonymous and antonyms.

entry.title: Separar i comptar síl·labes
entry.summary: Clic activities about Catalan language. The package has three levels destined to Primary and Secondary school. 1st Level: Syllables 2nd Level: Digraphs 3rd Level: Syllables, diphthongise and hiatuses

entry.title: Inversas
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish language. The application has 5 parts to practice these syllables: AS AR AN AL AM, AP, AC

entry.title: Ga-go-gu
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish language. The objective of this activity is learn how to use the syllables ga, go, gu.

entry.title: L'abecedari
entry.summary: Package about the practice and memorization of the alphabet in Catalan. This package is formed by activities which it is needed to use the auditory and visual attention and the practice with repetitive and cumulative activities.

entry.title: Ortografía
entry.summary: Clic activities about Spanish orthography. This package has fifteen lessons: The alphabet and to order words Capital letters M before p and b ca, que, qui , co, cu, ce, ci c, d, z r, rr g, j, gu, gü b, v s, x y, ll h Homonymous words Orthographic rules I learn words Antonymous and synonymous words The package includes document of Word with basic orthographic rules of the Spanish language.

entry.title: Twelve adjectives
entry.summary: Clic activities about some English adjectives. The package has 4 parts: Adjectives 1 Adjectives 2 Adjectives 3 Opposites

author.name: Catalina Carrasco Muñoz, Francisco José Sánchez García, José Antonio Guerao i Margarita Tudela

entry.title: El conte
entry.summary: This package contains 3 stories in Catalan to Primary School. These activities are the result of a Bordils' school project. The lead soldier. The new Emperor's dress. The stamp. After the stories there are some activities about them classified by levels.

author.name: Carme Congost Escura, Guacimara Martínez i Pilar Congost Escura

entry.title: Vamos a leer - 2
entry.summary: Package of activities for the learning of the reading. In the application we found activities where children have to differentiate short words from long words, to associate name-image, to discriminate if a word begins by vowel or consonant, soups of letters, riddles...

author.name: Claudia Lovrincevich, Elisabeth Castillo i Marisa Fernández

entry.title: Actividades de lenguaje para educación primaria
entry.summary: Clic activities about spelling in Spanish. There are six different types of activities: Dictations. Lists Tongue twisters Riddles Listening (dictations) Listening (words)

entry.title: Prefijos
entry.summary: Clic activities about prefixes in Spanish. The package has three parts: auto-, porta-, tele-. des-, in- (1). des-, in- (2).

entry.title: Inlgés 4º EP
entry.summary: Clic activities for primary school about the modal verb can/can't, description of landscapes and situation on maps.

entry.title: Abecedario
entry.summary: Twelve activities about the alphabet. In the package we find activities where child have to put in order letters, sentences and find witch letter goes after another one. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Abecedario (Discapacidad visual baja visión)
entry.summary: Twelve activities about the alphabet. In the package we find activities where child have to put in order letters, sentences and find witch letter goes after another one. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Abecedario
entry.summary: Twelve activities about the alphabet. In the package we find activities where child have to put in order letters, sentences and find witch letter goes after another one. It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

entry.title: Salut les copains!
entry.summary: Clic activities in French to Secondary School based on the French book of Anaya Publishing House. In the package we find activities about: People presentation. Present of verbs finished in -er: faire, to aller and to come. Interrogative estructures, il and a Geography of France, products, monuments and characteristics of some localities.

entry.title: What are they doing?
entry.summary: Clic activities about English grammar destined to Primary School. The objective is practice the Present Continuous: The package has the following contents: Verbs: write, dance, play, laugh, swim, read, run, rain. Personal pronouns. Sentences in present continuous with the 8 previous verbs. Oral and written structure of sentences and pronouns. Yes/No questions and Short answers. Some images are from the book "Big Red Bus 3", by Ma José Lobo and Pepita Subirà (Ed. McMillan - Heinemann).

author.name: Celia Sánchez Albarracín, Francisco José Sánchez García i José Antonio Guerao Navarro

entry.title: Otsoa eta Azeria
entry.summary: Clic activities for to learn Basque. After reading a story child can do different activities about: understanding spelling writing the story and its parts particle use (omen and ote) verbs

entry.title: Síl.labes, tonificació i accentuació
entry.summary: Clic activities in Catalan language formed by three thematic blocks: Syllables: to count syllables, separate syllables, digraphs and kinds of words. Stressing:stressed and unstressed syllables and types of words according to the tonic syllables. Accentuation rules:types of accents, accentuation words...

entry.title: Orden alfabético
entry.summary: Clic activities about alphabetical order in Spanish. This package about the alphabetical order is grouped in 9 blocks of activities that present a progressive difficulty. It is thought to BE used from 2nd of Primary school to the first courses of Secondary school and has 460 different words in different activities. Each pupil can study continuously and progressively widening his/her practice. The aim of this package is increasing the degree of exercise difficulty progressively from knowing the order of the alphabet till be able to order groups of words. It¿s advisable that pupils have pencil and paper to write down the words that are going to order. This is a need for the ninth section.

entry.title: The animal
entry.summary: Clic activities in English about the names of animals. In the package we find association activities, puzzles, text activities, and crosswords.

entry.title: English adjectives
entry.summary: Clic activities in English about common adjectives, their antonyms and the place that occupy in the sentence.

entry.title: Estimulación del lenguaje
entry.summary: Clic activities about language stimulation in Spanish. In the package there are different kinds of activities: Spelling. Problems of reasoning, opposites and analogies. Confusion of phonemes, graphemes, associations, analogies, put in order. The months of the year and the days of the week. Temporary notions, to put in order and definitions. Situations, comparisons and classes. Similarities, synonymous, antonyms... Associations, sentences and riddles. Absurds, texts, rhymes and riddles. Different words. Temporary sequence. Alphabetical order. Reading understanding, descriptions and definitions.

entry.title: Vamos a leer
entry.summary: Clic activities to learn to read in Spanish. The package is divided in 14 parts with 14 different consonants: < I>p, s, l, m, t, n, d, ll, b/v, n, c/q, f, r/rr, ch. For each consonant there is a list of words that children must associate with a sound or with an image.

entry.title: Aprender a leer
entry.summary: Activities based on the book "Lenguaje y Comunicación 1" (Editorial Universitaria - Chile - 2001), distributed by the Ministry of Education of the Republic of Chile. The aim of this application is learn to read in Spanish language. Throughout the package we study different consonants < B>l, M, S, T, P and N with activities of identification, puzzles, associations, text and writing answer.

author.name: Andrea Carolina González Muñoz i Mónica Patricia Genet Guerrero

entry.title: Comparatives and Superlatives
entry.summary: Clic activities about comparatives and superlatives in English. The application has three activities with ten different adjectives.

entry.title: El pollito Chiqui
entry.summary: Clic activities based on the story Ayuda, mamá, ayuda (Ediciones Beascoa Publishing house), destined to special education, infantile education and first cycle of primary school. The activity has four parts: Story to see. Wants to be the children¿s first attempt to start reading interactively and intuitively Activities 1. have 31 exercises where it¿s not necessary for the child to read. these activities contains very easy association exercises and puzzles playing with colours, sizes and space-time concepts. Story to read. The child can listen the tale or read it if the sound is switch it off. Activities 2. have 39 exercises, 11 of them are text based. this package also contains puzzles, numbers form 1 to 5, find the differences and word-image, word-word and sound-word associations.

entry.title: Phonetics
entry.summary: Clic activities about English phonetics. The package has more than 80 activities where children can learn to pronounce words.

entry.title: Llengua valenciana 5è (Nova versió)
entry.summary: Clic activities to learn the Valencian modality of the Catalan language. The activities can be carried out by one or two players

entry.title: Grupo CL
entry.summary: Thirteen Clic activities about Spanish language with associations, puzzles, crosswords, etc about the recognition of the orthographic group Cl ( Clavar, clara, clase, clip...).

entry.title: Town and country
entry.summary: Clic activity pack about english as a foreign language. The main objectives are: To learn and practice vocabulary associated with the central topic To get familiar with the prononciation of the new words To recognize and use this vocabulary in a meaningful context (oral and written) To understand the structure and meaning of conditional sentences of the second type To write simple conditional sentences To predict which words are right in a context To understand the important information in a text about other cultures To use the Internet as a search device to obtain information about a given topic To elaborate a presentation with the information obtained

entry.title: Riddles
entry.summary: Clic activity pack about English riddles. These activities are designed for English as a foreign language students. The level is very basic therefore apt for young students. The exercises deal with a few words but these are treated in a complete fashion, dealing with the sound of the word, a graphic representation of the object, how it's written, etc. The student also has the opportunity to record him/herself repeating the words and then listen to this recording and compare with the original representation given. The riddles presented in this activities were created by students of the school CEIP Sant Gil (Torà-Lleida).

entry.title: Once upon a time
entry.summary: Clic activity pack in English. Based on characters of famous children stories (Cinderella, Sleeping beauty, Asterix and Obelix, among others) which pretend to stimulate the young student into learning a series of basic words in English, as well as the names of these characters in English. The exercises are varied and have plenty of clever graphics showing the characters of these stories. The activities are directed towards elementary school children.

entry.title: Sopes de lletres

entry.title: Jac i la mongetera màgica
entry.summary: Clic activities about the story of Jack and the beanstalk are a reduced version of this famous story. They are defined into three sections according to their difficulty and are directed towards students of parbulary and elementary school. The activities contain sound and music files to make it possible for students without reading skills to participate in the activities, as well as enhance the interface and make it more appealing for students who do know how to read. The activities have the following sections: READ THE STORY DO THE PUZZLES AND PAINT STRIP THE OGRE MATCH WORDS AND DRAWINGS It is adapted for low vision impaired children.

author.name: Antoni Prim Dibuixos: Joan Antoja Mas Veu: Helena Prim Rovira
